1.content:
"Shannon! Would you just CHILL for half-a-second?!?", pleads Casey to her hysterical little sister.

"No, Casey! Not until we're all OUT of here! There's something not right tonight! I wanna go home!", Shannon begs, tugging on her big sister's right arm, while Paul, her new boy-toy has a firm grip on Casey's left.

" - that's right, kiddies! Sneak into Dr. Tickle's Torture Dungeon for absolutely FREE! Tonight ONLY ! Be the "test subjects" for the mad doctor's diabolical experiments in---", harks the gravelly-voiced carnival barker made-up in greasepaint and masquerade gowns, leering over the children as they pass below his makeshift stage.

Pulling closer to Paul, Casey laughs, "Shannon, you are so jealous! Why do you have to do this every time I -"

"Casey, PLEASE!", and Shannon frantically grips her big sister's arm, "We need to LEAVE here! Didn't you notice the way the face-painter back there acted with Erica and Richard? What about those CLOWNS? They aren't supposed to TOUCH you, are they? I'm telling you, there's something very - "

Shannon's desperate pleadings are interrupted by the eerie masked face of the barker, poking in over their shoulders, "That's right! Mosey on, my little pigeons! There's cotton candy and corndogs for you to stuff yourselves on just past the tents. I wouldn't expect little Midwestern PANSIES like YOU to brave the good doctor's dungeon, anyway!".

"Whatever, freak!" Paul chides, as Casey laughs and nudges up tightly next to her date. "Let's DO this!", says Paul as he saunters in past the curtains, the rest of the kids (some hesitantly) in tow.

"Good luck, kids! You'll NEED it! You little - - ", and Shannon shuts the door on the scary pitchman, only to plunge them all into total darkness, each trapped in a separate holding cell.

"Well well! What have we here?" laughs an entirely too creepy voice from the blackness. " Welcome, children! I am your host for this evening's merriment - Dr. Tickle, and you are about to experience the most invigorating night of your tender young lives!".
As each of the bunch fight the bars of their cages in futility, their captor emerges from the shadows, a wild-eyed human head in a jar sitting on the seat of a Hover-round chair, twin sets of long and short mechanized tentacles wiggling menacingly at the head's behest.

Puttering past the now sobbing children, the head-in-a-jar announces, "Now you're in MY hands, you little brats! And I won't be happy until I've spent all night deciding which of you little pissants is the most pathetic SLAVE for me to pester FOREVER, and that means that each of you is my honored and cherished prisoner until dawn. One of you will be staying with us, here on the Midnight Midway, as our pretty plaything, while the rest of you will be more than happy to forget that any of this ever even happened! Good luck, kiddies! You'll NEED it as you try to find the exit out of Dr. Tickle's Torture Dungoen. Bwahahahaha!"

And the last thing each of the kids hear as they are sent hurtling in screaming terror down into secret cellar shafts is the mad cackling of the disembodied head-in-a-jar, some floors above.



{From this point on, writers are encouraged to continue the plight of the five unwitting child captives, as each separately attempts to escape from a madman's dungeon of perversity, and survive the nightmare of Dr. Tickle's Torture Dungeon!}
1.title: The Starting Gates

11.content:
Casey stood up inside the holding cell and looked down at her now ruined outfit. She hadn't bothered with a costume tonight; Halloween was just an excuse for her to be out late, though her usual fun was spoiled with the others tagging along. She was the catch, and she knew it: perky double-D breasts, perfectly rounded ass, legs that went all the way up, everything that looked perfect in her head cheerleader outfit, her Young Miss Orange County outfit, and of course, her Saturday-night-and-I'd-like-to-get-to-know-you outfit. Of course, that last one hadn't been put together with this kind of situation in mind. Her pantyhose were ruined, her skirt was torn, she'd lost her shoes and her white sweater was covered by what she could only pray to the God of Fashion was just mud. This just capped the night. She thought Paul would be good for a fling; he was new to the school and she thought he was cute enough to give a chance, but instead he'd proven to be all looks and nothing else: no charm, no brains, nothing. To think, she'd wasted this good outfit on a stud dud.

The voice from before -presumably Dr. Tickles- spoke again, this time only to Casey. "Don't fret over it, my dear. You'll need to change anyway, if you're to continue." Immediately lights came on revealing five doors before her, each with a box placed before it.

"Door number one is the path of the adventurer. The path is wrought with peril, but offers great reward to the daring." Casey could see it was a pair of light boots, white socks, comfortable shorts, and a tank top. Easy to move in, though not exactly fashionable.

"Door number two is the spirit of rebellion. The path is for those that think they can defy those who serve me here, though I do not recommend it." Casey examined the box and saw black nylons, a pair of denim cutoff short shorts, black heeled shoes, and a bustier. Actually somewhat trendy, she thought.

"Door number three is the path of the hunted. This way is for those who would seek to hide from me, which I admit would be a very wise thing to do." Casey noted it had black shoes, black nylons, black shorts, and a tight black t-shirt. To the point, she thought.

"Door number four is the spirit of Halloween. The path provides little peril, and so thus the outfit provides little protection." Casey peeked inside. It consisted solely of a bra shaped so that each cup looked like a Jack O' Lantern, a pair of black panties with a spiderweb pattern to them along with a matching pair of sheer stockings, and a witch's hat. So, it seemed the price you paid for taking it easy was looking ridiculous.

"Door number five is the path of the penitent. This path is for those who fear becoming my eternal slave. Within, you will find my guards waiting for you. You will be taken and subjected to some tickling, but not beyond your endurance, and in the end you will be allowed to leave. It is the chance to suffer for your sins so that you can be guaranteed new life." That box contained only a pair of pink panties and a low cut bra.

"I warn you," he said, "do not attempt to pass through the door without the appropriate outfit. If you do, your suffering shall be the stuff of legends, child." Casey would normally have dismissed that, but the way he sounded, and the way the situation felt, he seemed just crazy enough to keep that threat. Whatever door she picked, she'd do what he said.

Even while running furiously again, Casey immediately feels the spot where the cup had landed suddenly inflamed in a maddeningly itchy, tickly fashion. Then one and another of the shafts land, hitting her in the flank of her right leg and in her upper left arm!

         âOww! Oww! Dammit!â, Casey cries, and she feels a slight tug from these darts as they too dislodge when sheâs run a few more yards, leaving insanely itchy spots she is almost compelled to rub and scratch at, despite her desperate flight from her pursuers.

         Then she begins to finally make out her little pursuers! Itâs almost as if Caseyâs eyes suddenly grow accustomed to them or something, but she starts to see the wee little camouflaged figures hiding and running along the branches and vines above and around her! And Casey realizes they almost have her surrounded and cut off, even as still one and another dart stick to her exposed skin. âCut it out!â, yells Casey as she scratches herself while trying to simultaneously run from her pursuers. And she can now make out their little war chant, as they sing in unison, âOoga-booga, ooga-booga, bang the war drum! Capture the intruder, and tickle her for fun!â as they give chase.

         Still more of the sticky darts hit their marks, targeting all over Caseyâs body and now yanking and tugging at her skin, and she is almost ready to stop running and to throw up her hands in surrender when:
1111121112.title: arrow

1111121113.content:
The overgrown small path invited all kinds of plants and possibly small animals to make contact with the smooth, meanwhile wet skin of the bra and panties clad teenager. Casey moved forward slowly, her bare feet moving over wet moss. She moaned when she missed a particularly large leaf above her. Water spilled over her back, soaking her panties. It was not pure water, but the girl would find out soon enough.

'Eh that's beautiful." Between the maze of leaves and branches Casey spotted a lovely blossom in deep red and purple colors, with something in bright yellow rising from its center. It was only a few steps from the path. Squeezing herself through even thicker undergrowth she arrived at a large tree from which the flower with the fantastic blossom sprouted at eye level. When she carefully touched the flower she heard something rustling in the leaves above her. Far too much rustling for a bird.

A snake
A furry animal
A boy clad in fur
1111121113.title: animal

11112.content:
Casey pauses to size up her situation. A pit of maniacal clowns lays in front of her as a crazed giant races towards her flank. Casey looks to her left hand and sees the remaining boot she still has in her possession. She removed it from her foot after having the other boot forcibly removed by the midgets whip.

Casey carefully analyzed her choices and then snapped into action. She transferred her boot to her right hand and chucked it as hard as she could at the giant lumbering towards her. To her utter surprise, and dismay, The giant Jobor caught her size 5 boot in midair and tore it in two.

"Plan B" thought Casey as the midgets super-sized lackey discarded the remnants of her footwear and continued towards her. Left in just her stocking feet, Casey took off running as fast as she could toward the cable hanging over the pit of clowns. She grabbed the wooden handle and with Jobor right at her heels, Casy jumped of the edge and began gliding over and across the chasm on the cable. As she did, Jobor made a last ditch effort as he jumped after her. Casey was just a hair length outside of his reach and the giant tumbled into the pit, wiping out most of the clowns below who had been taunting and desperately trying to grab the sock-clad teen.

"Yes" thought Casey excitedly, as she reached the other side. The teen saw she.was now faced with another choice. Two doors lay in front of her. One very large, the other it appeared she could barely fit through.
11112.title: Throw her boot at the giant

choices: Continued to push against the walls towards the light
Decided to try and dislodge herself and face the midget head-on
1112.content:
Casey decides to take her chances in the lower chamber, even as the three-foot-tall ringmaster and his giant compatriot advance from behind.

“Oh ho ho,” cackles the midget, his demented voice bouncing off the stone walls. “I wouldn’t go that way, little Dora!” Casey nearly jumps out of her skin as yet another crack of the bullwhip explodes mere inches from her feet.

“Bite me!” Casey shouts back to her pursers, as she descends down the stone staircase. Something is peculiar about the walls around her, but her mind is too busy navigating the dimly lit stairs to truly understand what’s happening.

The voice of the ringmaster is getting distant as she goes deeper and deeper into the stairwell. Casey chuckles to herself, using her hands to feel the stone walls ahead of her. On top of her well-sculpted body, cheerleading has given her enough endurance to escape circus freaks. They should’ve mentioned that benefit when they begged me to join, she thinks, smirking in the darkness.

Suddenly, she sees a bright light ahead. Freedom! She nearly shouts in joy at the sight, and doubles her speed. “Nice try, Dr. Freaks-a-lot,” she murmurs to no one, “but you’ll have to try a bit harder to catch Casey the gorgeous-“

Her voice is abruptly silenced as her body careens to a halt. Her mind had been warning her, but freedom seemed so close, so she ignored it. But now, there was no choice but to face it – there was something odd about the walls. They were getting narrower! The ceiling was barely higher than her head, and the walls closed in, pressing her from each side. Casey was slim, but she could barely move forward, even when she shimmied with her shoulder leading. She tried to half-crouch, half-walk, but quickly got jammed between the cold stone all around her. The light ahead was so close, yet every step forward was a struggle. She yelled out in frustration.

“Aha!” shouted that all-too-familiar half-pint freak. “Do you understand now, sweetcheeks?” His voice was getting louder again, and his crooked steps echoed closer. “Little hallways aren’t built for such busty young women!”

“Dammit,” she cursed, trying to suck in her already toned gut. The midget was right: her large chest was giving her the most problems, projecting out against the cold stone. “The hell with it,” she muttered, pushing her body face first towards the light, squishing her breasts against the wall. The ringmaster was getting closer, and Casey struggled with all her might. She:
1112.title: Descent into Trouble

11121.content:
“Augghh!”

With all of her strength, Casey pushes against the stone walls, projecting herself headfirst towards the light. Her well-endowed bust is squeezed between her chest and the cold rock, trapping her arms and hands at either side of her now-horizontal body. The effort is a success! At least, for her head, now protruding into the light. It’s a tiny doorway to some sort of stone chamber.

“Damn it,” Casey mutters. So it wasn’t freedom after all. Just another trick of the malicious Dr. Tickle. She tries one last push, but just manages to tighten her body even further into the narrow passage.

“Why, what do we have here?” laughs the freak ringmaster, mere steps behind her trapped body. “Did little Dora the Explorer finally find something she didn’t want to see?”

Casey is suddenly acutely aware of just how ridiculous she must look: her whole body jammed into a tiny corridor, with her head barely poking through some sort of stone archway, and her legs and feet dangling in a rather unlady-like fashion. And on top of everything else, she had to listen to the disturbed squeak of the midget ringmaster, amused at her helplessness.

“My, look at those shapely legs,” the midget says with what could only be awe. Casey feels a slight touch of a sweaty, stubby finger and instantly jerks her leg.

“Don’t you dare touch me, you sick freak!” Casey shouts, trying to be as intimidating as a cheerleader possibly can. Her words are either unheard or ignored by the ringmaster, who touches her leg again, this time running his miniature hand down her calf. She recoils once more, but this time, she feels the ringmaster’s other hand clamp around her squirming leg, preventing it from moving. “Ahh, so soft...” whispers the carnival reject.

“Let me go, you creep!” the trapped teenager shouts again, her voice bouncing pointlessly into the stone chamber ahead of her. With a burst of adrenaline and fear, she kicks out, hoping to catch the head of the midget tormentor. Instead, she finds both legs suddenly immobile – wrapped in some sort of leathery rope.

“My whip isn’t just for show, you know, sweet cheeks,” chuckles the ringmaster, pulling the make-shift binding tight around her legs. Casey feels the hands of the midget stroking both bound legs, exploring her toned thighs and calves. Despite the sense of violation, she can’t help but giggle at the sensation. She would have to be ticklish on her bare legs, wouldn’t she?

“Oh, if only Jogor could see you know, Dora,” sighs the midget, absently caressing Casey’s leg while she struggles to contain her laughter. “He’s even more of a foot man than I am, quite frankly.”

The midget:
11121.title: A Tight Place

11122.content:
“Ah, forget it,” Casey mutters, pulling herself back out of the quickly-narrowing corridor. “I’ll deal with you head on, you little cretin.”

She straightened out her tank top, and gave her whole body a quick brush. Maintaining her appearance was a primal instinct for Casey, and even when facing a disturbed midget and his overgrown comrade, she was determined to look her best. But one of the few problems of being so attractive was that men – of all ages – were constantly leering at her. She knew the look quite well, and knew exactly what it meant. So as soon as she was old enough, Casey took some basic self-defence courses, and now considered herself more than proficient at handling men. And she was sure she could handle midgets, too.

So when the stunted ringmaster rounded the corner, Casey prepared herself to disable him in the most efficient way possible. “Say adios to your little package, little man!” She shouted at him, charging down the stone corridor. The midget looked nonplussed even as Casey closed the distance, her chest bouncing wildly. She slowed, reeled back her well-muscled leg, and aimed for the tiny space between his legs. “I hope Dr. Tickles reimburses you for the broken jewels!”

It wasn’t much of a battlecry. And it wasn’t much of an attack either, as the midget deftly stepped aside when Casey swung her foot at him. Wildly off-balance, her expression went from confident to confused in half a second. And in the next half-second, the ringmaster kicked out her other leg, causing Casey to rotate in mid-air and land face first on the cold stone floor.

“Tsk, tsk,” the midget chided, placing a small but strong foot on Casey’s back. All she could see was stars, and mumbled something about watching his step. “You’re quite the headstrong little tart, aren’t you?” The midget asked, giggling to himself. He unspooled his whip, and grabbed a hold of Casey’s twisted foot. “That’s not always a bad trait, in a carnival. And for an adventurer, it’s certainly an asset.”

Casey’s head was still spinning, but she could feel the midget wrapping his whip around her feet. With a quick yank, the midget bound her feet together tightly. “Unfortunately for you, my beautiful Dora, it’s also Dr. Tickles’ favourite trait in a slave.”

The midget then shouted to his companion, Jogor...
11122.title: Misstep

111221.content:
Casey was still stunned by her rather ill-timed attack on the demented ringmaster. Her vision was swimming, but she looked up in time to see Jogor arrive – his mammoth body hunched over to fit into the rather small corridor. In his basketball-sized hand, he carried a huge bundle of cloth strips... like something a mummy would wear. With her feet bound and a strong midget pressing down on her, Casey could only droop her head as he approached.

“Hurry up, Jogor, you ridiculous oaf!” the midget shouted, impatiently tapping his foot (which happened to be on Casey’s back). “This busty little trollop won’t stay down forever!”

Casey could smell pungent B.O. as Jogor arrived in front of her. The half-man, half-giant was glistening with sweat, and his bald head was like a shining cue-ball in the dark corridor. Casey tried to turn away from the approaching carnie-stink, but a small stubby hand grabbed her hair roughly. She screeched as her head was pulled back by the ringmaster.

“Oh be polite, Dora,” chuckled the midget as he collected the mummy wrappings from his bald partner. “Jogor here has feelings too, you know.” Casey groaned, her back arching painfully as the ringmaster tugged on her hair with his free hand. Jogor stood silently, his dull eyes darting between Casey and his midget master. Even through watery vision, Casey could see that the giant didn’t have many feelings beyond hunger.

“What do you say we add another mummy to the collection, Jogor?” The midget released his grip on Casey’s hair, and her face fell forward onto the stone floor. Her scalp was burning with pain, and smacking head-first into hard tiles didn’t exactly help either. To think, this night was supposed to be about the start of a quick fling with Paul – not a freaking mummification by a sadistic dwarf!

The midget finally stepped off her back, giving Casey a moment of relief – only to have a pair of massive hands grab her around the waist. Jogor easily lifted the teen from the floor, and she hung limply in his grip. He adjusted his hands so that her arms were pinned beneath gargantuan fingers. But it wasn’t like she could move them anyway. She barely had the energy to moan in protest; struggling against the monstrous man-child would be futile. The midget chuckled to himself as he unwound the bundle of cloth strips. “Let’s start with those gorgeous gams, sweetcheeks.”

The midget tied one end of the long cloth strip around her ankles, and began to run circles around Casey. Each lap added another layer of the binding material to the teen’s well-toned legs, starting with her smooth calves. Her mind was screaming at her to resist, but aside from a slight wiggle of her toes, she couldn’t move. Jogor held her with a vice grip, slowly moving her body downward as the layers of wrappings rose higher and higher up her legs. The sight of a quickly accelerating midget running in circles should have been humorous – even a few hours ago it would’ve been a laugh riot. But now, Casey’s legs were quickly becoming fused together beneath all that wrapping, and the situation was terrifying. The teen cheerleader tried to pull apart her legs one last time, but the binding material was like flexible steel. And now it reached her waist.

Casey could scarce believe the midget could work so thoroughly, so fast. Her entire lower body – ankles to waist – was cocooned in the unbreakable cloth wrapping. She could barely bend her knees, and even that took every muscle in her legs to do so. But even in the rather dire circumstances, she had to admire just how shapely her legs looked under all that wrapping. Well, I’ve got to stay positive, she thought, trying to summon whatever mirth she could.

The midget paused once he was satisfied her legs were immobilized. He motioned for Jogor to lower her to a seated position on the stone floor, and clapped his deformed hands together. His misshapen, bulging eyes twinkled with glee. “Now, let’s work on your upper half. I hope you enjoy this part as much as I will,” he said with a wink, and Casey just groaned. She squirmed as best she could, but Jogor held her upper body still - his iron grip tight around her shoulders.

But again, the midget paused. “Oh my, that’s right. I nearly forgot,” the ringmaster muttered, slapping his forehead comically. He straightened out his ridiculous circus coat, and turned his nasally voice into a booming trumpet.

“Before I cocoon you alive, my dear adventurer, and turn you into yet another spectacle of Dr. Tickles’ fantastical show,” he looked down at Casey, his eyes positively glowing with excitement. “I need to ask you a question!” His once tiny voice now seemed to resonate the very walls, and Casey had no choice but to listen.

“What does an adventurer seek above all else?”
111221.title: “Bring the wrappings!”

1112211.content:
“I don’t know, and I don’t care, you little freak!” Casey shouted, shooting the midget her cruellest glare. With her legs mummified beyond any hope of escape, and a mentally-deficient strongman keeping her arms at her side, it was about all she could do.

“Wait, what was that, my dear?” the malformed ringmaster asked, his eyebrows rising with theatrical animation. “I didn’t hear an answer to my question. Speak up, I say!”

Casey pulled one last time against Jogor, but found no give in the man-child’s grip. “God, what is wrong with you people?!” the half-bound teen asked angrily, exasperation permeating her voice. Sighing as loudly as she could, Casey supposed some answer might at least shut the little freak up. “Fine. Riches, whatever. Just let me go!”

“BINGO!” boomed the diminutive carnie, his arms splaying out widely. Casey twitched at the unexpectedly loud cry. “We have a winner, folks! Ding ding ding!” He put his creepy little hand into the front pocket of his jacket, pawing around for something. While doing so, he stared at Casey and continued his flamboyant spiel.

“My, how could someone so beautiful be blessed with such intellect? What cruel God would doubly endow a little trollop, and rob others of both brain and appearance?” The midget mocked, pointing to his half-wit friend Jogor. Casey looked up, but saw no response from the strongman. Clearly, a God with a sense of humour, she thought.

“Indeed, folks - this little adventurer deserves a reward for her well-spoken, and well-cultured response!” The ringmaster pulled his arm from his pocket, revealing an object to an imaginary audience.

What was it?
1112211.title: Riches

11122111.content:
“Behold!” the carnie dwarf bellowed. “The armlet of Anur’Tet, the most beautiful Egyptian princess of the ancient world! Forged by the finest blacksmiths of her royal court, it’s said that the souls of Anur’Tet’s conquered enemies inhabit this gorgeous artefact.”

Casey was rather unimpressed by what the ringmaster held. It looked like a fairly simple ring of polished metal – maybe about three inches across, and certainly not gold. Perhaps brass, or maybe copper. It was dangling from a thin rope, as if had been worn as a necklace. Wow, what a treat, Casey thought to herself. She couldn’t even resist rolling her eyes.

The midget noticed this, and his face lit up. “And it seems that the busty adventurer is quite thankful for the treasure! Truly, Dr. Tickle has bestowed a rare gift to the lovely lady.” He winked at Casey with a bulbous eye.

That was all she could stand. “Give me a break, you little worm!” Casey spat back at him, glaring with every ounce of hatred she could muster. “I don’t want your garbage, and I’m not a stupid adventurer. Unwrap me this instant, and take me out of here. I’m going to bring down every one of my parent’s lawyer friends on your little freakshow and then we’ll see how generous Dr. Freaks-a-lot is! You’re going to prison for the rest of pathetic life, and I hope the other inmates are as-“

Casey’s tirade was ended with an abrupt sputter. Jogor, after releasing her shoulders, pulled open her mouth with several sausage-sized fingers. She feebly tried to pull his arms away, but they were unmovable. With her lips and mouth stretched wide by sweaty, salty hands, Casey could only gurgle as the ringmaster approached.

“And, as we all know, the ancient Egyptians were masters of innovation!” The midget bellowed, advancing to the bound teen with a quick hop. “In addition to its use as an armlet, Anur’Tet approved it as a silencer for unruly slaves!”

Casey pitifully yelped as the midget pushed the armlet into her mouth, tucking it securely behind her teeth. She tried to resist with her tongue, but it slid uselessly against the cold metal ring. Jogor removed his fingers, and adjusted the attached rope so that it pulled tightly against the back of her head. The metal ring was anchored in place, wedging her mouth wide open. Fine lines of saliva began to creep from the corners of Casey’s mouth.

“She likes it!” shouted the ringmaster in triumph. “Didn’t Dr. Tickles say she would, Jogor?” The man-child didn’t respond, but instead pulled Casey’s free hands to the small of her back, causing her body to arch forward. She pleaded with them to stop, but all that emerged were gargled mumbles.

“And now, my dear, sweet Dora,” the midget tormentor started, looking into Casey’s angry eyes, “we finally add you to the collection.” He collected the discarded wrappings again, and began to walk towards her.
11122111.title: Masters of Innovation

choices: The ringmaster then mummified her head
111221112.content:
The delighted midget hopped onto Casey’s cocooned lower body, straddling her with his crooked legs. She winced as he did so. How could such a tiny runt be so heavy? she wondered, fixating her hate on his deformed visage. His head was at eyelevel with her chest, which now protruded outwards thanks to Jogor’s firm grip on her hands.

“Ho! What bountiful bosoms you have, sweetcheeks!” The ringmaster gawked, staring at the perky orbs in front of him. Casey could feel his warm breath through her tank top. “Ughhhhh,” she groaned, causing an especially thick glob of saliva to drip from her mouth. The little tormentor brought the wrappings to bear, and gleefully began the next stage of mummification.

This time, the binding was slow and methodical. With Casey’s hands cruelly pushed into the small of her back, her upper body was forced outwards and upwards – a perfect position for the midget to loop the cloth strips around her. The captive teen just looked to the ceiling, hoping it would be over quickly. But the little freak was taking his time and savouring every moment. With her hands pushed into her lower back, the binding strips held them tight against her body as the midget progressed up her stomach. Soon, the wrapping was just below her bust, and her elbows were welded in place. Jogor finally released his grip on her. Well, that was certainly a plus, she thought bitterly, well aware that all of her limbs were now packaged beneath the form-fitting material.

“Hmm...” the midget muttered, taking a brief break from binding. He seemed to be at a momentary impasse. “Guh?” Casey asked with a slobber, her chin receiving a good web of saliva.

“Glad you asked, Dora. Now, Dr. Tickles has already given you his treasure,” the ringmaster began, his eyes never deviating far from Casey’s bustline. “So I think it’s time you gave him yours.” The young teen was utterly confused, and tried to remember if she had picked up something valuable in this little freakshow. She shook her head, assuming the midget was mistaken.

“Ah, allow me,” the ring master nodded, smiling a sickly grin. He placed his hands on the shoulder straps of her tank top, and yanked them to the sides. Casey squealed as loud as she could. Her breasts, although still supported and somewhat covered by her designer bra, were well exposed to the dungeon air. “Double Ds, I presume?” laughed the midget, ogling the teen’s cherished bust. Casey squealed again, trying to squirm away, but Jogor remained behind her, keeping her still. “Love that colour, hun. Black goes with everything, doesn’t it? Although I would love to see the contents of that bra, Dr. Tickles gets the first peek.”

The midget returned to the binding, never quite taking his eyes off Casey’s ‘bountiful bosoms’. Rather unfortunately for her, he left a strategic gap in his wrapping - allowing her breasts to remain protruding out from the cocoon. Give me a freaking break! Casey thought angrily. If you’re going to wrap me, wrap everything! Don’t leave that area open!

But her thoughts were as futile as her struggling, and soon, the cocoon reached her neck. It was an odd sensation – never before had Casey been so restrained so utterly, without a slight bit of give anywhere. Whatever the material was, it seemed to push back if she tried to flex against it. And as exhausted and pained as she was, she barely had the willpower to do so. There would be no way out, save at the ringmaster’s discretion. And now, the little freak - still straddling her - smiled a crooked smile.

Casey groaned, as yet another string of spit dangled from her chin, and landed on the top of her right breast. For someone so used to looking her best, it was certainly turning into a rather humiliating Halloween. Casey Sullivan - cheerleading goddess, who could have her pick of any boy from school (or any man out of it, for that matter) - was now almost a living addition to the freakshow of Dr. Tickles.
111221112.title: Bounty of Youth

choices: The first of several endurance tests
111222.content:
âDa-Ha! Tickle purty girl feetsies and toes?â the giant Jogor enthuses as he fumbles around for the dwarfâs preferred tickling toys.

         âWha-? Hell no. No way! Ungh!â, and Casey manages to wriggle sideways under the struggling dwarf, who is trying to wrestle her wrists together behind her back using his own belt (causing his pants to fall down to his knees in a goofy manner), âNo oneâs going to tickle anyone today!â, yells Casey as she makes one deft feint and tries to squirm out from the clutches of the little man, though her ankles are still bound tightly by the whip.

         Unfortunately, the move only causes her a moment of freedom from the dwarf right into the hands of the now prepared giant, who yanks her towards him and back into the wider area, kicking and screaming, until he has enough room to simply throw Casey over his shoulders, with her knees on either shoulder of the big man, and her feet still whip-bound at about his upper chest level. This leaves Caseyâs upper legs and entire rest of her body upside-down, dangling from the broad shoulders of the massive Jogor. The dwarf takes the opportunity to grapple with her arms again, and this time manages to tie Caseyâs wrists together with the belt heâd been attempting to use while he had her on the floor.

         âThere now! That should keep you from injuring yourself while we bring you to a special talent âauditionâ for the head honcho of this traveling torture dungeon. Heâs already taken an eye to you, kiddo. Could be your big break! Just think of it! A life of fame and riches on the road, traveling with the carnival. Every night an adventure, instead of this dreary Midwestern small town life. But first, we have to do a little inspection. You know, just see where you land on the sensitivity scales. Itâs a big thing with doctor, you know.â

         The whole time, the dwarf Ringmaster is tagging along behind in the steps of the giant, fussing and fighting with Casey, who canât do much to evade the two-feather attack of the dwarf on the exposed areas of the blonde babesâ skin.

         Casey is chortling and too busy trying to keep the feathers away to make much of a retort. but with her wrists bound, she is lucky to fend off one feather at a time while the other always finds itâs soft target. Then, she feels the giantâs big doofy fingers playfully tickling her feet, and Casey explodes into a conniption.

         Casey is screaming with laughter from the playful double tickling attack, and her pesky captors are heartily laughing, delighted in the deliciously ticklish nature of this gorgeous, cornfed country honey as the three troop through some dimply lit corridors towards:
111222.title: Spoils of Sport

choices: Casey runs left, down the stairs
Casey runs right, up the stairs
You're caught - all that jabbering was to keep you from seeing the giant
1113.content:
Casey knew what was going to happen if she ran through the mummy hall, so when the first mummy reached out for her she easily dodged past it and grabbed a bandage, then the second mummy and did the same. The third one did manage to grab her shoulder and stop her, but that was when she heaved on the bandages she'd grabbed, causing the two mummies to topple over into the one that had her, allowing her to get free. Still pulling the bandages, she went on past the fourth and fifth, then wrapped the bandages around the outstretched arms and left them tangled up. With just one mummy left in her way, she grabbed one of the torches and swung at it, and it shrank back from it. She could hear the cursing from the pursuers stuck far behind her with a five mummy pile up in the way. She ran past the last mummy into an intersection and ran down a new path, leaving them in the dust. All told, a pretty good escape, even if she said so herself.

"No, you haven't!" the midget growled at her from the darkness, and she saw him there, though luckily there was a small barred window between him and her. "You've fallen victim to one of the classic blunders, see?!" He gestured, and she saw that there was a spiral staircase leading up and another one leading down. "The only other option is to try to double back."

"So what?" Casey demanded. "One of the paths leads out." She hadn't really thought about how he'd known what she'd been thinking.

"Yes, but which leads you out, and which leads further into the dungeon?" the midget asked. "Now, a clever girl like you could never hope to be would remember that she fell down to get into the dungeon. So clearly the right path up the stairs is the way out. But Dr. Tickles would have known you'd think that fact and would've counted on it, so you clearly must choose the path to your left that leads down. But going down also cannot be the exit because you'll have to go up eventually to get out anyway, so you clearly must choose the path to the right."

"Just shut up, you're trying to trick me!"

"A hard thing, I'm sure. You've beaten my mummies which proves you're very agile and adaptive, so you might choose the left path counting on that to get you through the dungeon to the exit. But you also ran from my giant, which proves that you know when there's an insurmountable adversary, so you'd try to stay out of the dungeon as much as possible, so you must choose the path to the right!"

"You're trying to stop me from working this out," she said in frustration. "Well it won't work!"

"It has worked! You've no idea what's going on and- Oh, what in the world can that be?!"
1113.title: Unarmed In A Battle of Wits

11131.content:
Habitually flighty, Casey seizes the moment to dash down the dimly lit spiraling staircase to her left. “Good luck trying to match ME in a battle of wits!” giggles the sprightly teen babe as she opts for the dimly lit downward-leading staircase to her left. “See you in hell you creepy lit-“, and Casey’s rebuke to the midget is cut short.
Already two flights flight down, she sees a metal sign approximately the size of a license plate bolted to the stone wall with the words "SECRET LABS" embossed in raised letters.

“Really?”, puzzles the total cutie.

Casey hears a loud metal-on-metal clanging sound at the stairs entrance above her. “That doesn’t sound promising”, thinks the deliciously jiggly blonde as she makes her wiggly way down further still into the eerie silence of the stairway ahead.

The stunning beauty arrives at a stone-floored landing with a metal elevator door and a choice of up and down facing arrows. “I suppose one arrow takes me to the 'Secret Labs', but I wonder where the other one might take me. Back outside, maybe? Eenie-meanie-miney---mo!”, and Casey presses the...

11423.content:
Casey froze in horror. From Paul's distorted face and wild look in his eyes she immediately deduced that the boy was serious about it. Still it took more than a second for her to realize what she saw. She understood that he had called her name even though the voice was muffled from the socks in his mouth. With his back strapped to a rack he only wore a half torn t-shirt and shorts. To his sides and his feet she could see six human beings with such delicate features that they had to be children, even though they wore masks that she briefly thought that she had seen them before on tv. Three masks covered the face from just above the mouth and had something like a crown on top, while the other three masks were in the shape of a head of a fox, a mouse and a cat. It was still deadly silent apart from Paul's audible stress from breathing. They wore dresses in various shapes, lengths and colors.

The voluptuous teenage girl turned on her heels. Without the looks on Paul's face she would have been even curious to find out what kind of a strange party went on here. And if they were children younger than her not much could go wrong anyhow, right? But the door she had just gone through was locked. Casey banged on the door and rattled the door knob, but the door did not move a bit. When she heard steps approaching her, she wheeled around.

To her horror the skimpy clad teenage Halloween witch saw two tall scarecrows walk briskly towards the place where she stood. That must be real people costumed, but the sight was looking real and scary. They were dressed in rags above a cover of bristles which looked from a distance like straw, but from a close perspective it was a fiber that was much softer. Each carried a leather bag on a string hanging from their shoulder and a broom it its hand. Their faces were hidden behind black masks. Only their eyes looked icy and determined. Both of their hats had a number of holes at their front and sides. And Casey had a close perspective meanwhile, much too close for her taste. She dived to one side to dodge the grip, but quickly she was overwhelmed.

The scarecrows carried the cursing and pleading Casey to a place next to the rack where the boy was strapped. Two masked children who stood at that side next to Paul quickly sped out of the way. From the ceiling two shackles were lowered which took firm hold of the girl's wrists and stretched her only a bit when they were pulled up again. The girl was thankful that she could still stand on her feet without having to go on her tiptoes. Her ankles were fixed to one of the brooms with her legs spread slightly more than shoulder width, which allowed her just to keep contact with the soles to the ground. She still wore her pumpkin style bra, the pair of black panties with a spiderweb pattern to them along with the matching pair of sheer stockings. One of the scarecrows brought the witch hat which had tumbled to the ground when Casey was tackled. How it rested again on her head.

Paul took in the sight of his beautiful night out companion with a mix of delight and despair. Casey could consider herself lucky that he was tied to the rack and that there were other people in this room. His thoughts travelled on a journey what would or could happen if...But the looks of Casey's eyes told him otherwise. He could read like from the frontpage of a newspaper that she scolded him of getting her into this mess, and that she thought little of his mental abilities. Furthermore, he thought that he did look stupid tied and silenced with even his own socks in his mouth.

The tied teen witch saw that the masked children were ordered by the scarecrows into their previous positions around Paul. Casey could see that the masked kids rushed to obey in a style that made it obvious that they already had experienced what would happen if they did not fully comply instantly. Now the tied girl was able to have a closer look at the clothing style of the children. Particularly one of them, standing on the opposite side of the rack and facing Casey caught the tied girl's attention. The face was covered by a mask, which unknown to Casey was called a colombina. A bright red blouse with long sleeves and cut out parts showing bare shoulders was separated from a long skirt of the same color by a wide black belt, which was made of cloth. The skirt was much wider around the masked girl's ankles. Accordingly she wore a crinoline below. Horizontally the skirt was separated into parts by lines of little golden plates, which sparkled in the dimly lit room. Casey could see some perky little shapes below the shapes of the blouse. It was clear that at least this masked child was a girl.

Paul flinched when the masked kids were back next to his rack. Then...

1143.content:
Backing away in horror from the sight of Paul's helpless situation, Casey's eyes light on the outline of a door in the darkness at the far end of the room. But can she make it to it before the hooded figures catch her?

Pointing an accusing finger at her, the smallest of the three, a figure clad head-to-toe in black with a black book under it's arm cries out: "Get her! She's a witch, and must confess to the tickling inquisition!".

Immediately, one of the burly, hairy-armed torturers stops tickling Paul and turns toward Casey, who screams and makes a run for the far door.
1143.title: Hooded  Dungeon Torturers!

choices: Casey tries to sneak out of the room.
Casey stays to help and maybe gain an ally.
11431.content:
If the hooded man hadn't been wearing a robe, he would've easily caught the terrified teenager. Unfortunately for him, he manages to trip on his robe and lose time stumbling trying to regain his balance. "Quickly, don't let her escape!" shouts the shortest, probably the leader. He and the other 'inquisitor' run straight for the doorway that is Casey's target. These two men fare no better against their vestments, and before long they too are stumbling, allowing Casey enough to to dash through the doorway and slam it shut behind her.

Noticing a bolt to her left, she quickly slides it into place, locking in the three inquisitors... and Paul. She feels sorry for the poor dimwit, but in this insane funhouse it's every man and woman for themself. Besides, Casey figures that the mad doctor would give her boyfriend a chance to escape. He wouldn't choose a slave and end the game that soon - no, he was far too sick and crazy for that. He'd relish watching each kid struggle to avoid the ticklish traps and torturers he sent after them, that's just the kind of madman he was.

Convinced that the immediate threat had diminished, Casey feels safe enough to examine the room she tumbled into more closely. Tables line the walls, packed end-to-end and only allowing enough space for the two doorways, one of which Casey stood in. Each table was crammed with what looked like a wizard's workshop items: piles of books, scolls and parchment, bowls of powder, flasks of liquid, phials, plants, even what looked like a lab experiment complete with an old bunsen burner and retort. In the center of the room is a series of circles with runes inscribed within the resulting rings and various items placed here and there. A pentagram just barely touched the innermost ring, the entire diagram surrounding a human skull, its empty sockets staring into nothingness - fake presumably (hopefully).

Despite herself, Casey bounces over to the little lab experiment, attracted by the smell. The liquid that the eperiment produces gives off a sweet and relaxing aroma, and for a few seconds the troubled teen is able to forget where she is for a moment and what awaits her in the near future. It came as quite a shock when the far door opened loudly into a table, knocking a few of the filled phials onto the floor, promptly shattering them against the ground and letting their contents spill out onto the cold stone floor.

"A thousand curses!" mutters a rough voice coming into the room. "I keep forgetting to put a doorstop there... I'd spent two weeks brewing those elixirs - to weeks! Curse my forgetfulness! Ah well, it gives me an excuse to try experimenting again." The voice belongs to a grizzled old man carrying a large bx of new materials and items. In his task of deciding where to put it, he doesn't notice the terrified teenager until he sets down the box and turns around looking for his pestle.

"Ah, the good doctor sends me someone at last!" the old wizard exclaims with relief. He takes a moment to study Casey, taking in her scant clothing and pointy hat. "And an aspiring witch by the looks of it. Though why in the name of all that is arcane are you dressed like that? No, don't answer, I'd rather not hear of another of the depraved doctor's sadistic tales. You're just in time, I was looking for someone to experiment on with this summoning circle. Don't be scared, I guarantee on my name as a wizard that it is perfectly harmless. Well, mostly harmless. There is the question of how the essences will manifest... but those are details. Please do help me out, I've been wanting to see the result for months! Yes, just stand there in the pentagram above the skull and I'll start the incantation."

For an old geezer, he sure can talk fast! Casey entertains thoughts of escape, but the wizard seems decent enough. She could stick around and help in some of his experiments, and maybe he'd help get her out later. On the other hand she has no idea as to what the wizard is up to, and with his back turned and hunched reading a scroll it'd be easy to just tiptoe out of the room and continue her escape. But with all these books here, and a wizard as a potential ally, she might actually be safer if she sticks around for a bit.

114311.title: Casey tries to sneak out of the room.

114312.content:
Weighing the pros and cons in her head, Casey ultimately decides to help the old man. There's only one way out anyway, and she'd feel safer if someone else was leading the way. Despite being a little skeptical about wizardry, Casey believes at the very least that he knows his way around the local area. Besides, his attitude is very convincing that this old geezer is not the sadist Dr. Tickles is.

Timidly approaching the chalk pentagram on the floor, she looks between the diagram and the wizard, whose head is still buried in a book. Arriving, she stands directly in front of the human skull, making sure her feet are nowhere near it. The white bone is utterly creepy, the two black sockets and lipless teeth plastering a permanent sinister grin on the skinless face.

"Oh so that's why the concoction didn't work," the wizard exclaims to himself quietly. "Of course, Simeon's first rule of magic-enhanced perception, of why didn't I remember that?"

Turning around, the old man finally looks up and notices that Casey is where he asked her to be. "Oh, good," he says. "Now we can begin, I just need to find the incantation..."

The impatient teen sighs inwardly as the wizard again looks back at his desk and rummages around the clutter and parchment, looking for something. Outwardly, she asks, "Excuse me, I'm looking for a way out, once you're done with whatever this is can you show me out?"

"Hm? Oh, yes yes, just after a few tests," the old man replies, never ceasing his search. "A lot of my experiments require a living human to test on, and I can't record the results if I test them on myself. Ah, here it is." Lifting a small pocketbook from beneath a pile of heavy tomes, he turns around once more and flips through the pages.

"Let's see, no, no, no, not that one, no, no, what the - how did that get in here?" he remarks incredulously, tearing out an entire page and throwing it on the desk. "I'll get to it later. No, no, this one, yes. Now I just need to..."

Paul retreated to the middle but there was no escape as the black water washed over the sides and engulfed his feet. The substance felt odd, slimy and slippery. Almost like ink...eventually the platform was at the bottom of the pool and Paul was left floating in the ink.

Lifting up his arm Paul watched in interest as the ink clung on, only excess sliding off. With his other hand Paul reached up and felt his arm. The ink aloud easy movement of his had across the arm making it feel soft and smooth. Paul suddenly had a horrible thought. He put his had back under the inky water and brushed against his ribs. The ink around his hand allowed it to pass so smoothly over the ribs that he actually managed to tickle himself! Paul was beginning to get the idea of what this ink was for. It was to make his body nice and slippery for what ever torturous tickle device the mad floating head had for him. A brush against his thigh helped him to conclude that this ink was working all over his body. Paul went still, "wait a minuet," Paul thought out loud "I wasn't the run to brush my thigh," in a sudden explosion of inky water and flailing limbs Paul was lifted up into the air. Opening his eyes Paul gave a yelp, he was completely surrounded by purple tentacles! An almost infinite number of them had burst from the water and now held him up in the air. The tentacles varied greatly: the thickest had a diameter of about 4 inches. Theses tentacles where the ones suspending Paul in the air, one around each ankle and wrist and a fifth one supporting his back to keep the weight off his arms. There where then many other sized tentacles going down to a small as hairs.

"What is this?!" Paul exclaimed in disgust. He tried to struggle but the slimy grip of the tentacles was as strong as iron. This time he did get a reply "oh you know, octopus, genetic engineering, stuff like that..." Said the disembodied voice of Dr. Tickles. "Well I suppose you can guess what's coming next (nobodies that slow) so I'll just leave you too it," and with that the tentacles dove in. Thicker ones probed at his sides and kneaded between his ribs whilst thinner ones lightly stroked around areas such as his toes and navel and anything in-between just tickled everywhere else. The ink that coated Paul's body allowed the tentacles to glide over his sensitive skin with such ease and grace that non of the ticklish sensations where dampened from rubbing. It also worked to block the air from his skin so that the nerves where on high alert which is kind of counter productive. Paul wiggled, squirmed, bucked and shook but the tentacles would follow his movements perfectly. "Please hahaha don't hahaha," the giggling boy begged "haha Sto- 'squeak' HAHAHA!" Just then some of the finer tentacles started stroking in-between Paul's toes whilst some thicker ones found a particularly sweet spot in his flanks.

All poor Paul could do was buck and laugh. His cheeks burnt red from embarrassment of having his weakness exploited like this and how the tentacles where able to find one sweet spot after another. It was like they knew Paul's body better then he did! "I thought hahahaha that I was supposed haha to be able to escape HAhahahaha!" Paul cried out
"Ah I think your confused," said dr. Tickle "firstly you have to make it through the chambers. Sometimes there will be a way to escape, sometimes it's after a certain amount of time and sometimes it's once I get bored and decided to let you move on. Secondly, this is just the preliminary round! My pet is recording every ticklish spot on your body, weather your ticklish to poking and prodding or scratching and light touches. From that I'm going to make the road to your possible escape hell. Or maybe I'll be nice and give you a tickling you can enjoy, maybe."
"Hahaha I don't enjoy tickling!"
"Oh everyone enjoys tickling, but only when I want them too. Now shut up. All I want to hear is your laughter whilst I take down notes. There's a lot worse for you coming up."
Paul's heart sank. He didn't think it was possible for there to be anything more tortures then this.

For a whole hour Paul endured the tickle torture from the tentacles. Every bit of skin was tickled in at least 5 different ways as the 'pet' tested Paul's body for the most effective tickling. When ever the ink had almost been completely rubbed off Paul would be unceremoniously dumped back into the inky water and and brought back out with a fresh layer of the stuff. Paul was held firmly in place at all times leaving no part of his body protected. When time was finally up, all the tentacles sank back into the water, apart from the ones holding him up. Paul was then lifted by the remaining tentacles and carried through a hole in the wall. In the next room Paul was lowed into line with a metal rectangle. On this rectangle where restraints that clicked shut automatically and held Paul spread eagle and up in the air. Throughout the process Paul offered no resistance, he was completely drained. Once the tentacles had left the wall closed up and Paul had finally regained enough energy to look around the room. The walls where tiled by whit tiles and the floor was made out of the same stuff as changing room flooring. The roof was white washed with a bright rectangular light hanging down. The whole setup gave the impression of a bathroom. More so from the drain in the centre of the room. Unfortunately this little brake finally came to an end as multiple tiles opened up for a huge number of cleaning tools to pop out. Wasting no time several hoses began to spray soapy water at Paul: purposely aiming fro sensitive spots like his armpits and feet. Whilst that was going on, differs brushes descended down onto Paul's outstretched body and got to work cleaning off the ink. Just as expected it tickled, a lot. With new found energy Paul started bucking and screaming only pausing to stammer "no!" As he felt the speedo being cut apart and removed from his body "what are you doing hahaha!" Paul screeched
"Calm down calm down," said dr tickle...well calmly "I'm just having the ink cleaned off, besides there's no cameras in here. No one can see you, it's all automatic. I may be insane but I'm not a pervert. All I do is to for fill my twisted obsession for tickling." Paul wasn't listing anymore, he just hung there laughing, the little amount of energy he had regained used up. Brushes scrubbed at his feet, string flossed between every toe simultaneously and a spinny thing like in car washes tickled over his belly. Every crevice was cleaned in a way to cause Paul ticklish agony. When it finally finished Paul was lowed to the floor and the rectangle released him. After resting for a few minuets Paul just lay there panting. His was the most intense tickling he had ever received. But, he wasn't going to let a bit of tickling stop him. He was going to escape.

Staggering to the door Paul bumped into a table and on them a new pair of black speedo. Blushing and remembering that he was in the nude he quickly grabbed them and slid them on. Paul then opened the door and stepped through.

The environment changed dramatically. His first step through the door brought Paul to a dark and damp cave. The floor was rough and cold on Paul's bare feet and he stood there shivering. "Ah Paul," came the voice again "your up sooner then I thought. Sorry for the delay, I'm just going through the information from my pet. Trying to figure out what kind of ticklee you are. Light tickling, harder tickling or maybe both...once I finish one of the doors will open and all you have to do is step through to your next task," Paul waited impatiently whilst the Dr. Did his calculations. Finally, he finished and opened up a door for Paul to step through. It turns out Paul is most ticklish to...
1242.title: Tickling tentacles

12421.content:
As Paul stepped through the metal door the environment dramatically changed once again. He stepped onto a rough carpet and was now standing in a typical music room. It had everything from the chalkboard to the music stands. In the middle of the room sat an electric piano and a stool. Dr. Tickles' voice came over the unseen speakers once again "if you would like to take a seat at the piano then we can begin." Unsure of what he was going to do (still a bit slow) Paul sat down on the stool. "Now please place your feet into the device in the floor," he instructed. Paul look down to see a small hole in the floor with several metal dares running across. Next to it was a diagram showing how to place his feet. Following this diagram Paul placed his toes onto one metal bar and then his heel on another. Automatically a third metal pole clamped down onto his toes and metal cuffs clamped shut around his ankles as the heel pole deceased it the hole. Paul's feet where now stretched out above the pole and where completely vulnerable. He couldn't move them atall thanks to the metal bars holding onto his toes. "Now Paul, your going to be given some piano pieces to play. Needless to say if you play out of time or hit the wrong note then you're going to get punished."
"But I can't play the piano," Paul responded "or even read music!"
"That's ok. As you can see I have numbered the piano keys. All you have to do is hit the right key when the number reaches the line." As he said that a screen flickered on, where the sheet music would normally be, with a line near the bottom and a number at the top. "Just to help you with your timing I'm going to set a metronome aren't I nice?" With that Paul almost jumped as a feather started swishing side to side across the arches of hiss feet rhythmically. He gritted his teeth and tried to block out the sensations but he was concentrating so much he hadn't noticed the first number dropping. The moment the number passed the line and went off screen an uncountable number of feathers shot out from the hole and and tickled Paul's feet without mercy, braking him instantly. Paul laughed loudly as his feet where tickled like that for ten seconds before finally stopping, leaving the lone metronome feather swishing back and forth at a steady beat. The numbers started falling again, but this time Paul was concentrating and managed to hit the first 3 keys correctly before missing. Once again he was subjected to the torture.

After an hour it had Paul playing twinkle twinkle little star with both hands and multiple notes at once (quite the effective piano lesson). When the sond finally finished the feather acting as a metronome finally stopped. He was panting and sweating heavily. Pools of sweat where forming on the creases of the leather piano stool. He had hit the wrong key more times then he could count but it was at least over 100. "That was beautiful," dr. Tickles said mockingly "brought a tear to my eye that one did,". Paul simply glared at a random wall not knowing where the secret cameras where, he was exhausted and humiliated from having to play with a stupid grin on his face as the feather tickled him. After five more minutes of rest Paul was...
12421.title: Light tickling (feathers, light touches and so on)

13.content:
Shannon barely had time to be frightened by the fall before ejecting from the shute and landing (more colliding) uncomfortably front-first. Groaning and picking herself up, she noticed without much amusement that her landing surface was actually a strategically-placed mattress on the stone floor of the chamber she now found herself alone in.

Dressed conservatively for Halloween in a long black dress, gloves, stockings and pointy shoes to appear as a witch (though she had lost her hat earlier in the night), the serious girl briefly wondered if the others had suffered similar landings - and if any of them were hurt - as she scanned the room. Lit only by torches on the walls, the walls looked cold and unfriendly. Scattered sparingly were the half-hearted decorations Shannon had come to expect from this fair - manacles attached to one wall, a skeleton (obviously fake... right?) lying on the ground by another, and so on.

Of more attention, she quickly noticed that the room appeared to have four exits. There were three doors with arched-carnival stylings in the walls to her front, left, right. There is also a trapdoor in the ceiling above. Approaching the one in front of her, she caught sight of a stone plaque, which featured a careful engraving of what appeared to be a chair with shackles on the arms and front legs. Turning and crossing to the door on her left, curious if it had a similar sign, Shannon discovers the depiction of a medieval-style rack. Turning to her right to examine that door, Shannon finds an engraving of a baby crib. Then, looking overhead, Shannon discovers a set of pull-down stairs leading up to a latched door in the ceiling. A sign affixed beside the door reads ‘ESCAPE HATCH’ in red. There is also a red safety light next to the hatch, though it is off at the moment.

Not caring much for the decor, and eager to get out of this basement and this fairground altogether, Shannon charged out of one of the doors at random, which happened to be...

131.content:
Shannon couldn't make heads or tails of the engravings so she entered the room with the chair. Shannon waitied impatiently for a jump scare that never happened, she circled the chair in boredom and flipped through a book on a nearby shelf 'Thaumatergy' it read... Shannon arched an eyebrow.. "What?..."

"Sorry I'm late" A cute woman looking to be in her 30s entered the room carrying a small wooden box and a few books. "Class please take your seats" the woman continued. Shannon looked around the room.. she was the only one there. "Take your seats please" the woman repeated. Shannon sat in the hard wooden chair, the stiff seat hurt her butt. "Smashing, now everyone settle down.. settle down please... quiet now" the woman rambled on, SHannon glanced around the room looking for the students that weren't there. "Thank you.. lets begin" the shackles on Shannon's chair snapped shut, clasping her ankles and wrists to the chair.

"Shannon"
"Oh that's hardly a scary name, what shall I call you?"
......"Shannon"
The woman chuckled and began writing on a blackboard that definitaley wasn't there when she entered.

"Quiet please, class has begun"
Shannon sat in a silence almost as uncomfortable as the chair which was hard to do. Shannon used this opportunity to give the woman a thorough look-over. She wore a black revealing dress that was tight around her curves, she like Shannon wore a pointed hat but fashioned striking black heels.
"Now then, so you wish to be a Thaumaturge-"
"A what?"
"Thaumaturgy... magic.. we girls call ourselves witches"
"You're going to teach me.. magic?"
"Why Yes"
Shannon laughed until her ribs ached "Okay, I'm out of this nut house, undo these shackles please-"
"SHHHHHH~!!!!" The teacher hissed. "We'll start with a basic 'Plumage Manipulation Spell'"
"A what?"
"Read this, and wave this around" The 'teacher' thrust a book into Shannon's face whilst passing a wand into her hand. As Shannon tried to read the text the woman removed Shannon's shoes and rolled her stockings off.
"Uuuh.. Pinnam-saltabunt?" Shannon read, flicking the wand. To her surprise a row of feathers materialised at the tip of her wand, dancing around the tip. "Oh my god.. that's amazing" Shannon played with the wand, flicks and twirls of the tip made the feathers dance around the room.
"Yes, yes, now remember dear you musn't lose focus. The magic that inherits these spells are that of mischief." The teacher dusted chalk off her hands, Shannon inhailed as she did. Shannon felt the dust tickle her nose.
"Ah..." Shannon inhailed

"AH..."
"Oh no"
"AH!!!" The feathers stopped dancing and became straight as arrow tips. "AH-CHOO~!!" Shannon sniffled. "Excuse me" Shannon flicked her wand. The feathers stayed in static formation.
"Ms Witch? I think I broke it..... Ms Witch?"
The woman was gone, Shannon glanced around before her attention was brought to the feathers when one twitched. "Hm?" Another feather flicked it's tip "The magic that inherits these spells are that of mischief? What did she mean?"

Shannon wished she hadn't asked. Two feathers drifted down to her bare feet and began tickling Snannon's feet with their downy tips. "Heehe-hey heeh cut it out!" More feathers drifted up her skirt and tickled Shannon all over her sore spots, along her inner thighs and the backs of her knees. "Heheeh st-tohohp that tickles!" The remaning feathers slid down her cleavage and worked their tickle on her soft tummy and sides. "HEEHEEHAHAAH THAT TICKLES!!! STOP IT!! CUHAHAHAT IT OUT~!!" Shannon wriggled and squirmed in attempt to avoid the feather's tickle but they were too skilled, following her body wherever she twisted and bucked.

"I told you not to lose focus" the woman said, entering from the corner of the room, surrounded by a glossy spell shield, some of the feathers tried to dive through her shield. "But did you listen? No."
"You mahahade me sneeze! Heeheeh!"
"Oh pish, posh"
"PLEAHEEHESE MAKE IT STOOOP~!!" Shannon continued her uncontrollable laughter.

13113.title: Detention

131131.content:
âHey! Waitaminute! Stop it!â, cried Shannon, as she suddenly faced a duel assault from pincer-like grasping mechanized tentacles that plucked and tugged and stripped her of her clothes. First her long gloves, then her tight costume top, and finally, even her tight dress and black nylons were all yanked from her, and pulled into the shadows beyond the well-lit torture chair.

         Meanwhile, the eerily prescient leather straps had dragged her, kicking and screaming, atop the chair and then rapidly strapped her tightly down, left in only her black undies and unable to so much as move an inch, Shannon was absolutely quivering in fear of what was going to happen to her next.

         Then Shannon heard the voice again. The same calm-yet-stern, almost drone-like voice told her, âMy myâ¦5 hour detention? Who did YOU piss off? Teachers usually only reserve that for their worst, most troubled students. Do you see yourself as one of THOSE type of students, Shannon?â

         âNo! Nononono! I swear! Iâm a nice girl!â, begged Shannon, attempting to make her case, but the voice interrupted her pleas.

         âSo you believe that there IS still hope for you, Shannon, and you are ready to suffer your detention and promise behave and not be naughty ever?â

         âYes! I swear! I promise!â, Shannon cried looking round her into the darkness, still hoping beyond hope that she might be freed from her bondage atop the chair.

         Suddenly, luminescent green lights shone on bubbling, bobbing brains in what looked basically like fishtanks with lots of tubes, atop rolling tables encircling her at four different points. Shannon screamed louder than she ever had on seeing them, but nothing could prepare her for the horror of mechanized tentacles (the same as had stolen her clothes) now writhed and wormed their way towards her from the mechanics under the brain-tanks on the tables. At two tentacles per bobbing brain, it was as if she were being threatened by four separate assailants!

         Then, as if all this wasnât enough to drive her crazy, a switch was flipped, and suddenly Shannon could hear the thoughts of each of the brains, just as if they were talking out loud! Each was focused on her detention time punishment, and it was as if she were being molested by four wicked teachers at once and their running comments on her plight ventured into nastiness and cruel bullying.

         At the same time, the eight various mechanized arms reached out and towards her wielding a variety of tools and implements to make her time in detention as exasperating as possible. Some had glove-like android hands; others wielded feathers and soft brushes in their steel pincers. One held an electric toothbrush, and they all descended on her, in a tickly swarm bent on making her laugh and cry and shiver and fight her unyielding restraints.

         In no time, the intense onslaught from all sides, stroking and teasing and poking and groping practically everywhere on her body (and returning to particularly ticklish ones) had laughing Shannon unable to even speak or plead for mercy, their unerring accuracy purposefully driving her mad with spastic reactions.

         But things went still worse, as the orchestrated attack took on new dimensions of breathless laughter as her feet were being teased in tandem with her underarms, and her ribs and sides were squeezed and teased from each side.

         Shannon was positively berserk with tickling now, and was reduced to unintelligible babble as her head rolled around on her neck wildly, as if making up for the total inability of the rest of her body to move.

The straps are for your own safety during the next portion of the attraction. There is no turning back in Dr. Tickleâs Torture Dungeon. You must sit-in-the-GODDAMN-CHAIR!â

         The way the monotone voice suddenly seemed to become loud and unhinged frightened Shannon enough to make her pause from her efforts to thwart the freaky leather straps, and she felt them tugging and tightening around her wrists, pulling her toward the chair. She screamed for help, terrified out of her wits at being tied-off to that scary chair and experiencing anything like she had already suffered in this crazy carnival attraction.

         Just then, Shannon felt hands grasping her by her shoulders and arms, pulling her back and away from the chair, and looked over her shoulder, relieved someone had come to her rescue. It turns out to be...

âCasey!â, Shannon cried out. Never in her entire life had she been so thrilled to see her popular, beautiful sister. She was even happy to see her doofus date Paul grinning his usual self-satisfied grin as the two helped her free from the restraining grip of the leather straps that had been fastening themselves around her limbs.

         âHurry! No time to talk! This way!â they yelled as they pulled Shannon out of the dreaded Detention Chair area, fought to close the door on the animated leather chair straps, and were together again. Shannon sans half her witch costume and shoes, and Casey and Paul similarly barefoot and wearing long ceremonial cloaks (and it appears little underneath from the glimpses Shannon gets of her sisterâs prestigious rack, not to mention Paulâs junk dangling free).

         Shannon tries to ask Casey questions, to see if their own experiences inside this bizarre carnival attraction have been anything as odd as hers, but they are back along what seems to be a more typical spookhouse maze full of flashing, colorful lights, deep dark shadows, and zany Hanna Barbara cartoon-like sound effects over a constant laff-track going on while all sorts of animatronic monsters pop out of the walls to wiggle soft tickly things at them. Other coils and mechanical tentacles reach out at them, mostly just for show, but at times genuinely hindering one of the three as they make their way through a more wacky, coochie-coo portion of the creepy sideshow.

         Shannon is still trying to ask her sister and her date what they know about this insane place theyâve landed in, but they shush her and continue on, literally pulling her by the arm, until they bring Shannon through a door labelled:

13113212.title: Dr. Tickle's  Insectarium Malifarsicus

13113213.content:
Shannon stopped at the door. "Wow, a show. That's good. Now we can sit and get entertained. I hope they have popcorn and ice cream. Do you have any money with you?" She looked at her older sister, who had an incredulous look on her face. "Eeeh - sure. I am sure you will be happy." Casey looked over to Paul and smiled. He nodded and patted Shannon on her shoulder. By stretching out his hand he gave her more insight into the lack of clothing under his ceremonial cloak than she was prepared for.

Casey meanwhile knocked on the door, tap tap, and, after a short break, tap tap tap tap. When a muffled voice asked behind the closed door she just called "it's us". The door opened. "Wait a moment" she said, when she saw that they had entered a changing room with lockers at the walls. "This is an odd entrance to a show. Are there only a few seats in the auditorium. Her skates apparently locked into the groove of the track itself, Shannon careens forward, deciding against either of the sidetracks she sees as she begins to build up speed. Almost instantly, she regrets the decision, as the track takes a startling drop, sending Shannon careening forward into a winding area with flashing lights and the distinct cries of her big sister, little Erica, and the boys all variously laughing, screaming, and begging!

The track takes a sudden body-joggling ascent again through a zigzagging area with a layer of machine fog so thick she can’t see her knees anymore, let alone her feet! To her sides, frightening mechanical manikins and giant motorized hands reach toward her, while speakers blare out “Are you ready for your doctor visit, little Shannon? HaHaHa…It won’t be long now…”

Suddenly, Shannon sees Dr. Tickles directly in her path on the track, and screaming, is unable to do more than run right into him! Yet another trick of the ride, fortunately. Shannon rides right through the optical effect and reaches an area where the track narrows and slows down somewhat.

Horrible laughs like those of some crazy asylum inmate bellow and scream from various nooks along the fake-stone cave moldings along the track, and Shannon passes by strange and scary wax figure tableaus of historic scenes of tickling as torture from around the globe and all the ages.

Then, behind her, she hears it. The screams and laughs of what must be the actual funhouse ride, coming her way. Above the crazed laughter of the tunnels she is cruising through, still widelegged on her skates, hands manacled together in front of her, Shannon hears them running through the portions she had been through minutes ago. Who knows what will happen if the ride carts catch up to her. She doesn’t want to have to find out! It sounds as if they are traveling at a faster rate than she is on her skates, and that they might round the bend at any second and run over her!
Then, ahead, Shannon sees what appears to be a maintenance area for the ride, with the track abruptly ending if she can take the turn without flying right off the rails and into one of the Styrofoam walls. She has literally a second to decide.

Stay on the track and try to build up more speed or find a better opportunity to jump the track

Veer off the track towards the abrupt turn off into the storage/maintenance area

In a split-second decision, Shannon reaches for and succeeds to grasp the hook above-head with her manacled hands, saving herself from a direct impact with the stone wall, only now she finds that the link between her wrists is caught over the hook, effectively trapping her in her black undies and still locked in the roller-skates, her arms high above her head.

         Fighting to extricate her wrist restraints from the hook, Shannon curses under her breath, knowing she might be able to sneak out of this accursed place if she can just get her wrists free. Stretching her slender body to its limits, Shannon cannot seem to quite maneuver her cuffs back off of the dangling hook.

She rolls around in little half-circles, unable to achieve any solid footing unless she points her toes downward, so that the skates rest on their brake-pads. This proves to be a taut, awkward pose to maintain in it's own right, but at least Shannon finally takes a moment to survey her immediate surroundings.

         She doesn't like what she sees at all, either, as Shannon finds herself in a darkened room, made to look like some sort of stone prison cell. One whole wall is devoted to a thick glass partition looking out into an area for visitors. She realizes she's trapped in some ghastly prison diarama setting inside the insidious Dr. Tickle's Dungeon Funhouse!
