She could now feel two fingers, one on each foot, slowly stroking up and down her feet. Erica’s face deformed into a huge grin, as a trail of giggles escaped her lips. For several minutes, the tickling didn’t change; just the simple two fingers gliding up and down the length of each foot. Erica’s resolve weakened. Her giggles came louder and more rapidly. She tugged at the stocks which held her feet. She twisted her body around in the coffin. Nothing could lessen the torment of her trapped feet.

After a little while, the vile woman changed tactics. Using four fingers, she scratched up and down Erica’s feet. Erica started laughing freely now, and pounding the coffin lid with what little strength she had. When the vampire heard her laughter leveling out, she stepped up her attack. With one hand she held her toes on her right foot back, and used the other hand in an all out tickle attack on her stretched out sole.

Erica screamed from inside the coffin. Nothing could have prepared her for this. Laughing at the top of her lungs, she closed her eyes, whipped her head back and forth and pounded on the coffin. The tickling sensations overwhelmed her mind. Nothing else existed except for the horrid sensations coming from her feet. She didn’t even notice when the vampire stopped tickling her right foot for a second so she could do the same to the left foot. As the vampire’s fingers came down on her new target, Erica’s eyes sprang open. The surprise of a new area being tickled added to the torment Erica was experiencing. Erica gave up all thoughts of escape as the ticklish sensations burrowed deep into her mind.

After nearly an hour, the vampire stopped. Erica didn’t even know the torment had stopped until the lid to the coffin opened. The vampire looked down at Erica. She was a bad sight; sweat dripped from every pour, urine stained the bottom of the coffin, and tears flowed freely from her eyes. The vampire waited for her giggles to die down before speaking.

“Well, well, well” the vampire said while shaking her head. “This won’t do. It appears your frail human body won’t last against my tickling fingers. I’ve seen this before, look.”

She pointed to a corner of the room. Erica peeked over the lid of the coffin. She saw a pile of bones from various human bodies, both large and small.

“Those are the remains of my previous victims. Most of them weren’t even as ticklish as you are.”

Erica shuddered. Being tickled to death was the worst thing she could think of. She looked up at the vampire with tear soaked eyes and began to plead. “Please…”

The vampire cut her off before she could say two words. “If you are going to ask me to stop tickling you, forget it. You are the most fun I’ve had in a while.” Erica’s eyes widened in fear.

“Don’t worry. I have an alternative solution. Your human body will not survive my tickling, but if I made you into a vampire, it would be a different story.”

Erica looked at her, confused.

“With vampire strength, you could easily take any tickling that was thrown at you. Your endurance and vitality would go up dramatically. No amount of tickling in the world could kill you.”

Erica thought about the vampire’s proposal. Before tonight, she would never even consider turning into a vampire. But the prospect of being tickled to death can change your outlook on life. Before long, Erica came to a decision.

141212211112.title: She keeps her

14121221112.content:
Despite Ashley’s insistence, Erica ascends the stairway. Ashley reluctantly follows behind. She keeps saying that this isn’t the way. But after a few minutes, they reach the top of the stairs.

They find a large room at the top. Along the walls are various tapestries and suits of armor; giving the room a sophisticated look. Also occupying the room are various bondage devices and other apparatuses that Erica could not identify. On the other side of the room was a door labeled CONTROL. Erica started across the room to the door when a booming voice stopped her in her tracks.

“You have failed me!” The disembodied voice seemed to be coming from everywhere in the room. “You failed to lead the young girl to her ticklish fate!”
Erica looked back at Ashley.

“I’m sorry! I tried to get her to where you asked! But she just wouldn’t listen to me!”

Erica was stunned and angry at the same time. She couldn’t believe that Ashley was working for Dr. Tickle all along. The voice continued it’s condemnation.

“Now you shall take her place instead!”

A suit of armor directly behind Ashley came to life and moved towards her. Ashley was too numb with fear to even resist. The suit of armor picked Ashley up and carried her to one of the bondage rigs at the center of the room. By the time her paralyzing fear turned to panicked struggles, she was already tied down in a spread eagle position. After it’s work was done, the suit of armor returned to it’s position on the wall; giving Erica no mind.

Ashley didn’t notice the machine above her until it moved. Above her was a little nozzle used for dispensing liquid. The nozzle was hooked to a frame that allowed it to move over any part of Ashley’s body. A thin tube ran from the nozzle to a five gallon bucket at the end of the table. The nozzle moved over Ashley’s helpless belly and let out a single drop of a clear fluid.

When the drop hit, Ashley’s face turned from frightened to odd amusement. She snickered, and scrunched up her face, trying to keep the laughter in. Erica watched Ashley’s reaction. The substance seemed to tickle Ashley, but not that bad. Just then, the nozzle moved half an inch to the right, and let out another drop. Ashley let out a giggle, and it looked like she had to try harder to keep her reactions in check. It seemed that wherever this liquid hit, it caused a tickling sensation that remained in effect. The nozzle moved half an inch forward, and released another drop.

As Ashley was doing a progressively worse job of trying not to laugh, Erica walked over to her bound form. She looked at the bucket that the nozzle was drawing the liquid from. On the bucket was a label which read “Tickle Water”. Makes sense, Erica thought. Erica looked at the door marked CONTROL, and then looked back at the bucket. Then she looked long and hard at Ashley, as if trying to decide something.
14121221112.title: Take the right path

141212211121.content:
It was quickly getting to be too much for Ashley as the tiny droplets had accumulated enough that they now ran from her belly down her sides and hips and even her most private area! Her face was all scrunched up and she was snickering, but still managing not to completely lose it, squirming and mewling in ticklish agony.
         Erica stayed long enough to scold Ashley, wagging her finger at her and explaining that she couldn’t trust her twice; then she quickly left the room even as Ashley’s snorts were turning into outright laughter while the strange water dribbled onto more sensitive areas, driving her to gales of laughter while she quivered and shook, tightly bound on the torture rack. Erica felt bad as she closed the door to her brief acquaintance’s ear-piercing pleas, but she was still intent on finding her way out of this place.
         The way the dungeon attraction is lit, Erica can hardly see anything overhead, but she is acutely aware that somehow Dr. Tickles is able to follow her movements through the mazelike halls, tunnels and dungeon chambers. “Is all of this being videoed?” she wonders, and tightly crosses her arms over her barely budding chest as she tiptoes on down a new hall in search of freedom. Still sneaking around in only the skimpy skirt, Erica feels nearly nude and shivers.

The first door that she comes to has a sign reading any of the following:
141212211121.title: Leave her to her fate

141212211122.content:
Erica’s face developed a wicked looking smile. Call it a sense of revenge; call it a flash of unjustifiable sadism (Erica couldn’t tell which) she picked up the bucket labeled tickle water and moved it over Ashley’s body. Ashley opened her eyes just in time to see a rush of water coming down on her face. In one steady motion, Erica had dumped the entire contents of the bucket from Ashley’s head down to her feet. The effect was instantaneous.

Ashley immediately erupted in a scream of tortured laughter. With eyes shut tight and body strained at her bonds, she went into an endless cycle of filling and emptying her lungs in a fit of hellish laughter. Erica had to plug her ears as the girl bellowed at ear-splitting decibels. Despite the noise, Erica was rather enjoying herself. Seeing the girl writhe in utter agony stirred up something dark in Erica. She enjoyed watching the girl suffer, but didn’t know why.

As much as she was enjoying the show, Erica decided to leave. No matter what other challenges lay ahead, she would always feel better knowing what sweet little Ashley was enduring. Made her feel all good inside.

Grabbing hold of the door handle, she opened the door to a large room with monitors lining the walls. Each screen followed a person; some still making their way through the maze, others now caught in some ticklish trap or another. In the center of the room was none other than the disembodied head of Dr. Tickle himself.

“Well, well, well.” Dr. Tickle started. “I must say, I am quite impressed. Not only were you smart enough to see through the girl’s deception, but heartless enough to increase her torment many-fold. I do believe I underestimated you.”

Erica smirked. “You can make it up to me by letting my friends and I go.”

Dr. Tickle smiled. “I’m afraid my original rule still stands. One of you must stay so the others can leave. But since you are such a formidable opponent, I will give you the chance to choose who stays."

Just then, the top of the room opened up, and four monitors came down. Once the monitors reached eye level, they came to life. The monitors showed Casey, Paul, Shannon and Richard all moving about the dungeon. None of them had been permanently caught yet.

“Here is your chance.” Dr. Tickle said. “Trick one of them into an unending tickle trap and the rest of you can go home. But be smart about it. You remember what happened to little old Ashley."

Erica shivered. She didn’t want to end up like her. But the thought of doing something like that to a friend or family member was oddly exciting. What was becoming of her?

Pushing away the thought, she knew she had to make a choice. In a battle of wit and wills, she decided to go up against …

As an added bonus, I’ll even give you the rest of your outfit back.” A hole opened up in the floor, and a metal pole with various hooks on it slid up. On the hooks were the rest of Erica’s schoolgirl outfit; the ones she lost while suffering the young boy’s tickle attack. Although she didn’t like being dressed up as a helpless little schoolgirl, she figured she would look more helpless half nude.

When she was done dressing, she took a look at the monitors in front of her. On the leftmost monitor was Casey. She was dressed in what looked like a good outfit for hiking and running down a tunnel trying to escape a giant and a midget. She looked out of breath and rather desperate.

On the monitor just to the right of that was Shannon. She was in her underwear, running through some kind of funhouse while trying to escape from clowns. She looked panicked and extra jumpy.

“I have to choose one of them.” Thought Erica. After some deliberation she decided to choose

1412122112.content:
Erica decided to leave the girl as is. She would have liked to help her, but stopping now would only put her at further risk of being tickled. In here, it’s every girl for herself. Erica walked past the cell, trying not to look at the girl’s eyes following her past her cell. As Erica walked past the bars, she thought she could hear a faint sobbing mixed in with the girl’s laughter. She dismissed the thought and continued down the hall.

At the end of the corridor, Erica saw a door. Seeing as how there was no other way than to go through (other than back) she turned the knob and walked in. Inside was a small room, nicely furnished. Despite the somewhat medieval look to it, the room looked rather comfortable. But it wasn’t the furniture or the lighting that caught her attention. It was the figure in the middle of the room.

Kneeling down in the center of the room was a woman. She looked older, maybe thirty-five or forty, but still rather attractive. Everything she wore was black, including the pointed hat on her head.

Great. Thought Erica. Now I’m dealing with witches.

The witch looked up at her and flashed her a knowing smile. “Hello little one” the witch said. “I was just sitting down to have a cup of my ‘special’ tea. Would you like to join me?”

Erica didn’t want to know just how ‘special’ this tea was. She looked past the witch and saw a door on the other side of the room. She could try and run past her, but if the witch really wanted too, she could stop her. She wouldn’t even need magic. But a tea party with a witch probably would not bode to well for her either.

Just then a thundering roar of a lion or tiger thundered through the door, followed by rapid racing paws scratching over blank floor. Erica screamed and pushed quickly the other way, just away from the door. With her semi exposed back she ran into the chest of the witch who laughed and said "Now ready for tea and cookies, darling?". Erica turned her head and nodded sadly.

When they stood up Erica pulled back her skirt into a proper position and looked around. She was searching for something she could borrow to cover her topless upper body. But there was nothing suitable there. When she looked at the witch she saw her wearing a large scarf draped over her shoulder. If tea time went nice she might be able to borrow it she hoped. Meanwhile the witch went into a corner of the room. Erica stood there not sure what to do. The witch turned her head and asked. "Which tea, sweetheart?" Erica looked at her confused. "You can have Widespread Sensation or Strong Truth." Erica gulped. "One which is not dangerous please" she said quietly. But the witch waited for the choice.

Suddenly something warm and furry touched Erica's leg and she jumped in shock. A very large black cat had appeared from somewhere and casually rubbed her furry body on the bare skin. With her hand patting the cat's fur she said "I take the....one" (first or second.

Which did Erica choose?
141212211211.title: Keeps skirt on and stays for tea

1412122112112.content:
Erica thought there was nothing wrong with truth as such whereas further - possibly ticklish - emotions sounded sound to avoid for now. "This Truth thing tea please" she muttered and stepped forward to watch. The cat at her feet followed her and rubbed her furry head on the girl's thigh. The tea preparation turned out to be boring. Nothing magical seemed to happen here. The old witch just poured steaming hot water over certain leaves. Then they took position next to each other on a sofa.

"What is it about this tea?" Erica asked. "Why is it called Truth?" The witch smiled patiently. "Because that is what you will say, and what you will get as response from other people until the effect wears off." Now the girl sat straight. That sounded interesting. "You mean if I ask you how to get out of here, then you will tell me the right way even if you don't want?" She blushed when she realised that she should have waited until she had her cuppa.

The cat hopped onto the sofa, climbed on Erica's legs and made herself comfortable there. A few times she carefully licked Erica's sides which made the girl giggle and push the cat's head away. But she was fond of the cute animal and kept her on her thighs. "No" the witch said. "Why not?" Erica stomped her foot, making the cat jump in turn. "I might chose not to answer you. In that case the truth keeps hidden. But when I speak you will hear the truth, or the truth that fits best to you, irrespective of what I say." Erica licked her lips and went for the cup. "But be warned. You will yourself only able to tell the truth. And if asked what you want or need you will spill your deepest longing and desire to anyone who is happening to listen." The girl gulped. Not talking, let alone not answering, was not her specialty.

Erica and the witch both took their cups, had a look into each other's eyes, and put the cups to their mouths. The girl sipped some tea. It tasted nice and sweet. The witch hat clearly drunk from it as well. In a cheery mood the girl drank the whole cup while casually stroking the cat's fur. Slowly the effect of the tea set in. Erica

"What kind of animal roared behind that door? Can you do magic? Can I borrow you scarf?" The conversation was boring because the witch did not answer. On the last question she just shook her head. Erica jumped to her feet pushing the cat to the ground. She felt that she now could do magic as well as any witch, if only concerning the truth thing. She needed an unsuspecting victim to practice her now power on. The only other person around was the girl she had seen before she entered the witch's room. "Can I go to the girl and ...and...see if this work?" "Sure. But only on the condition that you do not set her free." "Ok fine" she said, but "I might release her anyhow." was watch the truth the witch could hear. With a stern look the witch looked at the still topless girl and threatened her that in that case she could make the feathers go elsewhere. Erica gulped, chastened herself that she had answered to a question with a lie, something which would not work for her for a long time. "One more thing, please. Are those feathers the work of real magic?" "Yes, my child" the witch confirmed. "Can you make me control them?" "Yes I can, but I will not do it. Now go."

Erica went back into the open prison cell where the girl was now asleep while still tied to her bed. The feathers were placed next to her feet, not moving at all. Either the magic had ended or maybe the feathers had grown tired. This was very boring. "Hey you, wake up." Not waiting for a reply she placed her fingertips on the girl's soft soles and wiggled. The girl groaned in sleep and her feet twitched. Erica smiled and did it again, with the same but stronger reflex. "Time to talk" she said in a loud voice and grabbed the girl's bare thigh. The girl's eyes popped open and she squealed. "Be careful there. Please, untie me." "I will not untie you" she heard as a response. Her look changed from hope to despair. Erica instantly knew that she should have started the conversation differently. It was time to ask and to avoid responses. She was aware just when the other girl asked: "Why are you topless? Are you not ashamed?"

Erica did not answer. Just when she was about to ask she saw a black shadow hop into the bed. The girl screamed in surprise but cooled down quickly while the cat was lying down just below the girl's bellybutton. With her soft nose she poked the girl into her side which was covered by the blouse. "What is that cat doing?" the girl asked concerned. "She just wants to lick you sides, I think." Erica answered casually. "Ew that is weird." the girl responded. "Look I show you." Erica pulled the blouse from the girl's skirt and opened the three lower buttons. "Hey Hey Hey Stop that!" the girl shouted in alarm. With a look of deep thanks to Erica the cat turned to her victim and rasped her tongue over the girl's unprotected sides. While the girl was shaking with laughter and tried to shoosh the cat away Erica smiled. She was pleased with herself. This was a tickling place, wasn't it? Maybe the girl would talk now and stop inquiring.

Now it was time to find out about a way out, or about the girl's most ticklish spots.

The witch stops laughing and falls unconscious. Her body slowly falls down to the floor beneath her; but as she does, a perfect copy of her is left in the exact same position; hovering several feet in the air. Well, almost perfect. This copy seems to have a strange blue glow about her.

This new blue copy opened her eyes. She looked down at her body lying on floor and immediately got a panicked look in her eyes. She turned her gaze to meet Erica’s.

“Oh no…” She barely whispered. “You didn’t just cast the…”

Before the witch could finish what she was saying, several figures emerged from the walls. Like the witch, they all had the same blue glow about them, but that’s where the similarities ended. They were all different shapes and sizes; there was a little blond girl, a middle aged man, an adolescent boy and an ageing woman. They all had different styles of clothing and mannerisms.

Without saying a word, all the figures immediately walked up to the floating witch and started tickling her. The witch threw her head back and laughed her heart out. The mysterious figures gave her no respite; each of them changing their technique and target area to get the most laughter out of their victim. Overcome with curiosity, Erica walked up to the little girl, who was tickling the witch’s right foot.

“Excuse me? I don’t mean to interrupt, but who exactly are you?”

The little girl turned to her and smiled. “Oh don’t worry…” the blond girl replied while still running her fingers up and down the witch’s sole. “We are the physical manifestations of her past tickle victims."

The witch let out a shriek. Erica looked up and saw that the young boy had hit a rather sensitive spot on her armpit, and was now thoroughly exploiting it. Erica looked back down at the girl who continued her explanation.

“The effect of the spell you cast is the manifestation of all people the victim has tickled, letting them get their revenge. Unfortunately for her, she has lived a long time, and has tickled many people.”

Just then, a hoard of glowing blue figures came out of the walls. Men, women, children and senior citizens. Some were wearing the latest fashions, and some were dressed in medieval garb. It appeared the witch had been tickling people for centuries, and didn’t discriminate when it came to victims.

As the crowd descended on the witch, Erica decided her work here was done. She was sure these fine folk could keep the witch entertained for the next eon or two. Grabbing the spell book, Erica walked to the door at the other end of the room and walked out.

When she opened the door, she found a long, open hallway with two raised ledges running down either side. Sitting on those ledges not thirty feet away from her, were two creatures. Erica froze in her tracks. Luckily, the creatures were just standing still; staring at each other from across the hallway. Erica carefully closed the door to the room she just came from and pulled out the book of spells. Looking through the pages, she found two spells which might help her.

The system was still battered around from before, so she got the same wonderful experience of having the hands tickle all over her ribs and tummy, a scrubbing brush doing ticklish things to her armpit, and an electric toothbrush applied to her sensitive nipple and areola. The worst, though, was the waterpick, which sprayed her very sensitive outie navel until the shower echoed with her wailing laughter. On the way out, she again hit the equipment, so this time the washcloth-less hands tickled April's thighs all over, front back and on the inside. Meanwhile, the scrubbing brush was finding new and cruel ways to tickle her delectable bottom, scrubbing her full rounded cheeks until they were rosy all over. The toothbrush now slid its spinning bristles inside her bellybutton, sometimes slipping out to tickle around her tummy. The waterpick then sprayed the tickle spot on the back of her left knee for a while, before sending her back out onto her chair, where she wondered what was going to happen next.
1412122122211111211.title: Oops! What about the pedicure?

14121221222111112111.content:
After April was dried the two girls were dressed by the machine in fresh copies of their undergarments. "That's much better! Now, a bit of fragrance to keep the boys attention. A dab behind each ear, back of the knees, the wrists..."

"God, this is almost worse than the tickling," April grumbled.

"...crook of the elbow, and a good spritz in the cleavage! In fact, we'll slip a cotton ball with the fragrance inside your bra!"

"I withdraw the 'almost,'" April said as the machine slipped the ball deep in her bra. Thankfully the rest of the procedure went without tickle torture: the girls were dressed, their fingernails manicured, their hair done, and makeup applied. April grumbled the entire time as her eyelashes were lengthened, her foundation, eye shadow, and rouge applied, and her lips painted. Erica, who had played at this many times, still had enough of that left in her to enjoy this part of it immensely, and when she was released she actually was quite pleased with the result, looking like a magazine cover. April stepped beside her, and definitely looked like the centerfold playmate of Hopelessly Enraged Bitch Monthly.

"Not what I had in mind," Erica said, "but we look good."

"Erica," April fumed, "even if I agreed, and even if I thought I actually wanted to look good in this manner, and even IF I had a brain hemorrhage and wanted to pick up a boy: we're in a dungeon!"

"It's no reason not to feel pretty," Erica said. "I know you're not happy, but at least let me find whatever enjoyment I can in here, all right?"

"Just try to keep me, and my ticklish body, out of it next time, all right?"

"I'll try."

"Congratulations!" the machine said. "You have an achievement! You used all the beauty techniques!"

Erica looked at April in puzzlement. "It's like in a video game, you do certain things and you get an achievement worth so many points. What do we get?" April asked the machine.

"Erica receives this bottle of scent. There's enough for one dose: it can seduce a boy or drive away a monster." The small perfume bottle was placed before her. "And April, you know your lips are pretty special-"

"Yes, I know," she said with exasperation. The last thing she needed right now was to be reminded that she had the perfect lips to wrap around a man's business.

"Well, with this special lipstick, when you put those lips to use, you can knock someone out cold!" The lipstick tube was placed before her.

"Oh, marvelous," April grumbled. "Trapped in a tickle dungeon, and my sole power is sedating men with blow jobs. Chances are if I've reached that point, I've probably already wound up on the losing side." She slipped it into her cleavage anyway. "Not much of a prize, given what we went through, but at least we've learned a bit more about the game. Since it's going to take a long time, the more info early on, the better our chances."

"So we're ready to go?" Erica asked.

"Yeah, let's blow this place."

"You going to use your special lipstick when you do that?" Erica asked with a smirk.

"Don't start," April said. "I'm at the end of my rope as it is, this whole situation sucks."

"Just like you will when-"

"Erica!"

"Couldn't resist," she said with a smirk.

"Can we go now? We don't even know what's out this back door."

"I do. It's a nice long shaft." April stopped at the door. "And I can see you're anxious to get your hands dirty again when we reach it." April turned to look back at her. "I'm sure you'll have it licked in no time."

"I don't believe you," April said with a shake of her head.

"Finding it a bit hard to swallow?"

"ERICA! Shut - the hell - up!!! I mean it! From now on, I do all the talking, got that? You can give me hand signals or something, I don't care, but don't talk!"

"If that's what you want-"

"It is!"

"Fine," Erica said, and April turned back. "I'll let you do all the oral stuff you want." April turned back again with her hands on her hips. "What?"

"Do you not get how degrading this is for me?" April demanded.

"I heard you bragging about girls doing that for you all the time before," Erica said. "Suddenly it's degrading?"

"Can we skip the whole bit about me learning a valuable lesson from all this?"

"I'm not sure you have," Erica said. "This whole thing has been about you you you. Yeah, I get this is humiliating to you, how do you think I felt when you did what you did to me? I'm getting used to all this too, and all you do is complain, sucking the fun out of everything... and yeah, see what I did there? Because I'm at least trying to find a way to not scream at you over what happened!"

"Well I think I've paid the price for that!"

"It's not about paying the price! It's that you won't stop thinking of yourself! Despite the tickling, I had fun just now, and you seem bound and determined to complain about everything! You expect me to let go what happened to me, but you won't let go of what happened to you, now how is that fair?"

April was quiet. "I get that you're bothered, and I know it's my fault. I can't undo it, and I'm sorry. I'm just, with this, it's like everything is in my face, reminding me of what's happened to me, every little thing is there just to twist the knife. If I seem so obsessed with it, it's because every - single - thing reminds me of it. How I'm told to act and look and everything. That lipstick is just the final straw, just another reminder of it, and a big one. The idea that I would actually wrap my lips around some guy and let him cum like that, it, it, it..."

"Leaves a bad taste in your mouth?"

April laughed in spite of herself, and kept laughing. She laughed as hard as she had when she was being tickled by the man who had driven her to sleep with him. And then the tears came, and they all spilled out. Erica put an arm around her. "I can't do this," April said quietly. Erica squeezed her tighter.

"That's why we have to win. This isn't me either, and we're not going to be who we were until we win."

"I know," April said.

"And I need your head in the game," Erica said. "You are a girl, a hot girl, and yes you have a crappy special power for now, but there's only one first prize and we've got to do whatever we can to get it. We need to stay focused on winning, not on how bad things are, because that's why we were both put in the positions we were put in, with me in that bondage equipment and you in that slavers hands: to show us that things can get much, much worse. We win, April, that's what we do, that's all that matters."

April finally squeezed her back. "We will."

"Now, I'll make you a deal. Get your makeup straightened out without complaint, and tolerate the situation you've been dealt. In return, no more jokes, I promise."

April nodded. "Okay, deal. I'll get this straightened out, hopefully without being tickled to death, then we head up that long shaft."

"Actually there's stairs first."

"Whatever," April said, heading back to the makeup chair. "Why even mention it?"

"Just thought you should know you'll need to go down on it first." Erica grinned. "Last one, I promise."

April settled back into the chair. "This is not what I wanted to be for Halloween," she said quietly as the machine straightened out her makeup after her crying. Then together, they headed out of the room, down the stairs, and to a fork.
14121221222111112111.title: I See What You Did There

141212212221111121111.content:
There was a door with a keypad on it. In an alcove next to it there stood two chairs, over which was an animatronic dressed like a ticket taker, or at least, from the waist up, as its torso was sitting on a shelf. It spoke. "Welcome! I've been waiting for you for ages!"

"All Dr. Tickles machines seem a little too over-enthused," April commented.

"I see you have one achievement! That's great. You can use that achievement right now to get upgraded."

"What, like going from coach to first class?" Erica asked.

"No, silly! I mean an improvement to your abilities, so you can better play the game!"

"Wow, this place is really starting to feel like a video game," April said. "An upgrade would give us an advantage... I just don't, you know, want to get messed up even worse. If I shot heat rays out of my eyes, that's one thing, but if I wound up with a robot arm or something-"

"It wouldn't go with your look," Erica said.

"Don't worry! This upgrade is strictly to your brain!"

"Oh, well, that's certainly put me at ease," April said. "Silly me for being nervous."

"It's perfectly safe!"

"Safe for you to muck about with my brain? Your shower system dumped a cup of mouthwash on my groin-"

"Is that what that smell is? It suits you, miss!"

"You're not making any friends here," April said darkly.

"The upgrade won't be open surgery, silly! This helmet will lower over your head, and thought waves transmitted at you. You can learn things, and as a bonus prize, you will automatically be given the code to open that door!"

"Yes, but we could just go back the other way," Erica pointed out.

"Then again," April said, "most video games have shortcuts or special rewards for going into locked or hidden areas. If this is like a video game, maybe we should do it."

"Is your minty-fresh crotch in agreement?" Erica asked.

April hesitated. "I know it's a risk, but my guts tell me to do this."

"Very good, if the two of you will take a seat, your helmets should lower immediately. The process will take only a short while. Your bodies will be restrained for your protection, but you are assured that this will only be for the duration of the process, and that there are no tickling tools or devices here. It wouldn't matter anyway, because the helmet is the only reality your mind will perceive for the duration of the process."

The helmets were lowered into position, and the world was cut off from them.
* * *
"Greetings!" said the voice of the animatronic in April's head. "You will be shown a topic, determined at random, to be downloaded directly into your mind. Another, random item, will also be chosen to add to it, but hidden. You can accept or reject a given topic and have it choose again, but you may reject only four times in a row."

"Oh, so you give me the same choice four times, right?" April said.

"Actually, I think you mean five, miss. But no, if you reject an option, you will not have it repeated again."

"All right," April said.

"You can choose any three topics. Let's begin. Your first option is: Latin!"

"Boring, skip!"

"Your second option is: Escapology!"

"No clue what that is, skip!"

"Your third option is: Knowledge of Monsters 1!"

"That sounds useful. Keep."

"Knowledge of Monsters 1 chosen. Bonus topic is: Vocabulary Builder!"

"Boring, skip!"

"You can't choose to skip bonus categories, they are automatically generated when the main topic is. Beginning program transfers!" There was a series of flashing images and sounds that overwhelmed April as it was transferred to her mind."
* * *
Erica found herself in a less than reassuring predicament. "Hello?" she called. She looked about, trying to figure out what had happened. She apparently was naked and staked out spread eagle in desert and covered with honey. "What's going on?"

"I'm afraid you picked the bad helmet," the animatronic said. "You are in the virtual reality program."

"Oh no," Erica said, looking about, and she was suddenly terrified. "You've staked me onto an anthill! You can't-"

"Don't worry," the animatronic said. "It's not a red anthill. You won't be stung and you won't be bitten."

"Well then wh- heh heh what- Ha!" Erica saw the swarm of tiny ants start climbing up her body. "EE- HEHEHEHEHEHAHAHA Get them off!" They were crawling all over her torso, their tiny little feet tickling as they went. There had to be thousands, tens of thousands, running over her all at once! They bounced on her belly as she laughed under their ticklish influence. It may be only slightly less bad than the fire ants.
* * *
"Process complete. New round! Your first option-"

"Wait, wait," April said. "Before you said one of my choices was Escapology, the art of getting out of restraints. I want that one!"

"That choice was passed over, and because you passed over it, it will not be coming up again, so you won't keep getting choices you don't want."

"But I do want it! I just didn't know what it was until you downloaded the vocabulary builder into my head!"

"You should have asked."

"Argh!" April couldn't believe she'd unwittingly skipped what was probably the most useful ability in a place where things wanted to lock you up in restraints.

"Your first option is:" there was a chime, "Intelligence Upgrade!"

"What's that?" April asked with suspicion.

"Special prize, only two in the whole system. This will give you an increase in your intelligence."

"So I'll be a genius, maybe invent a ray gun to shoot monsters or something?"

"You won't actually get new knowledge, but you will have improvements in recall, creativity, logical thinking, and judgment."

April considered. Intelligence bonuses were usually the boring ones, but special prizes were always attractive. "Okay, keep."

"Intelligence Upgrade chosen! Bonus topic: finishing school!"

"Whoo-oo! I'm all for that!"

"Really?"

"Absolutely! Lay it on me!"

"Well, if you're so eager, I can give you the complete education package for finishing school. I didn't think you'd want it."

"You thought wrong! Give it to me!" The process began again, filling April's minds with sounds and images.
* * *
"Oh no!" Erica cried. "No not there! NO! HAHAHAHAHA!" The ants didn't seem to notice, climbing all over her outie navel, their tiny legs getting into every little fold of the sensitive button. She tried to pull the stakes out of the ground, but she didn't have the leverage. She could only lay there while the colony tickled her everywhere!
* * *
"Process Complete! Final round!"

"Wait!" April said. "Give me a second. My upgrade is taking a moment to settle." She started thinking very carefully, and then the facts fell into place. "Oh crap. Finishing School. You didn't mean I would have everything to finish school, you meant one of those how to act like a lady courses."

"Yes, I didn't think you'd want that. Sure surprised me!"

"So instead of trigonometry and physics and advanced shop classes to help me through this mess, I know which fork to use when eating shrimp."

"Well, more than that. You'll have the material down pat, so I'm sure you'll notice improvements in your walk, gestures, seating-"

"What?!"

"It'll all be instinct now."

"I knew how to sit in a damn chair!"

"Yes, but now you know how to do it like a lady."

April fumed. "Fine, let's move on."

"Final round. First option: Europe!"

"That sounds useless in here. Next!"

"Second Option: Philosophers!"

"What the hell good is philosophy going to be to me down here?!"

"Well-"

"Next!"

"Third Option: Complete mastery of bowling!"

"My god, you are packed with useless crap, aren't you. Skip."

"Fourth Option: Complete mastery of lockpicking!"

"Oh ho ho! Nice try! Lockpicking, but not anything to actually use to pick the locks. So without the tools, it's a useless ability."

"I see the intelligence upgrade has helped! Fifth and final option: Complete mastery of fellatio!"
141212212221111121111.title: Winners And Losers

choices: April programs the machine to win
April tickles the girl too much
1412122122211111211111.content:
April was silent. "You have got to be kidding me, tin man. You are kidding, right?"

"That is the option, miss."

"So to compliment the complete knowledge of being a perfect and delicate flower of a lady, you're going to teach me how to suck cock."

"That is the final option."

"You know, even with an enhanced intelligence and a massive new vocabulary, I cannot come up with the words to tell you how much I despise you right now."

"I am sorry, but rules are rules. Personally, I liked the bowling one, but I'm probably just jealous since I have no legs. Oh, uh, anyway, complete mastery of fellatio chosen! Bonus topic:"

"If it's how to take it in the butt, I'll rip off your head and give you a bowling lesson."

There was a chime. "The special bonus! You got both! It's Enhanced perception!"

"So, what, I'll see and hear more clearly?"

"You'll be able to sense things even better! That's two prizes! You must feel very fortunate!"

"Oh very," she deadpanned. "Should have taken lockpicking," she muttered, "what was I thinking?!"

* * *

"No more!" The ants now covered Erica's entire body from her armpits to her groin, tickling everywhere they ran, and they wanted to run everywhere! "No more-hehehehahahaha!!" Their tiny legs ran over her nipples, crawled the hollows of her pits, and traced every feminine curve she had. When they started crawling all over her feet, she started swinging them around trying to dislodge them, which just made them scramble around even faster, and that panic traveled through the whole group. She laid there, eyes screwed shut, laughing deeply in her little crevice in the sand, waiting for the simulation to finally end. Eventually, it did, though even afterward she felt a little itchy.

* * *

The helmets rose and the restraints were released, and Erica and April got up. "I have the code to the door," April said. "Also, learned some things about some of the monsters here, might come in handy if we come across them."

"Sounds good... so why do you sound so unhappy?"

"Never mind." April entered the code in the door and it slid open. "Let's just go," she said, heading ahead.

"My helmet was a trap," Eric said. "I wound up getting tickled in virtual reality."

"Oh, so technically it wasn't a lie," April said. "Nothing is ever straightforward here."

"That seems to be the case." The continued as the door ground shut behind them. "April?"

"Yes?"

"Don't take this the wrong way..."

"What?"

"You're really swinging your hips while you walk. I mean, it's very-" April made a noise of grumbling defeat. "-sexy. Any particular reason?"

"Yes, it's because shut up."

They soon reached another door, which they cautiously entered. "No safe room sign," April said.

"No, but there is one of a jigsaw puzzle piece," Erica said.

"Very observant," said Dr. Tickles from behind them. They jumped, as usual. "Puzzle rooms are like Safe Rooms in that no matter how long you're inside them, only ten minutes will pass. But, instead of rest and recreation, these offer you an opportunity to get a prize, usually a Tag, but sometimes another useful item. The catch, of course, is to be able to solve the puzzle adequately. No two puzzles will be precisely the same in every detail, but there can be some similarities. The trick, of course, is to try to deduce what they are."

"And they're all booby-trapped, of course," April said.

"Everything in a puzzle is ultimately fair," Dr. Tickles said. "More or less." He gestured to a control panel with a big START button. April pushed it, and the wall in front of them slid back, revealing a glass window and another room beyond. To their shock, a girl -probably about six- dressed in a ballerina costume, was brought in, her arms encased in some kind of metal restraints that ran in tracks on the ceiling. She stopped in the center of the room, and a similar pair of metallic restraints came up and locked around her lower feet and sliding out, so she was stretched out like an inverted Y.

"I'd like to ask you a serious question," April said. "Not exactly on this, but something I noticed. Like, on the one hand, you have all this technology and machinery in your place. On the other, you have these gremlin guys and seemingly magical abilities."

"Your point?" Dr. Tickles asked.

"Are you magical like a mythical creature, or are you technological like an advanced alien?"

"Perhaps I'm an alien demon," Dr. Tickles said. "What does it matter?"

"I'm... just interested in you. You can do amazing stuff."

"Eloquent as ever, my dear. The vocabulary builder helped." Dr. Tickles pointed to the display panel. "Special instructions will be here. It may or may not indicate objectives, obstacles, or punishments for failure."

"Interesting definition of 'fair,'" Erica said.

"There may always be an element of risk," Dr. Tickles said. "That's what rewards require, a willingness to take a chance."

April read it aloud. "'An Hour In Purgatory. This girl will be subjected to one hour tickle torture, you will decide how. The more intensely she is tickled, the higher your score, but the girl has a tolerance limit of: 60%. If her tolerance limit is exceeded you receive no prize and you are switched back to real time mode.' I guess that means we no longer are at the only ten minutes passing thing," she turned to Dr. Tickles, who naturally had vanished. "I'll assume that's a yes," she said, looking back to the controls.

"She's too young to be one of the middle school girls," Erica pointed out.

"Yes, I guess she's not 'in play,' as it were. Probably got her the same way he got us." She was still looking at the controls.

"This is all so crazy," Erica said.

"I know... believe me, I definitely know. Think I have this sorted out."

"Wait," Erica said, "you're not going to tickle that little girl for the next hour, are you?"

"That is the point of the puzzle," April pointed out.

"That's awful! You hate being tickled!"

"Which is why I need to win. Isn't that what you said? Do whatever I have to to win?"

"Yes I said to do whatever, but I didn't expect you to do something like this."

"No, you were expecting me to seduce some guy, right?" April turned on her. "Admit it. That you don't have a problem with, this you do."

"She doesn't have a choice," Erica said. "But you would."

"You know if I had to seduce some guy it would be because I had no choice. It would be just as much torture for me as this would be for her."

"Well then you get in the restraints and she can go seduce the guy, and that sounded much more clever in my head than it did coming out of my mouth."

"Look, I don't want to do this, okay? Even putting aside everything else, that Dr. Tickles always has the way of getting you to put your own feet in the stocks. But any advantage will help."

"Even your lipstick?" Erica said sharply.

April pulled it out. "I've still got it," she said coldly. "I'm not bringing it in case I need a touch up."

Erica sighed. "I hate this. Okay, do it, but nothing, you know, dirty."

April slipped the lipstick back into her cleavage. "I do have some standards."
1412122122211111211111.title: Different forms of torture

14121221222111112111111.content:
April hit some controls and instruments jutted out around the girl, terrifying her. Considering her options carefully, April tapped some more buttons, and a set of rubber-tipped prongs emerged and entered the girl's armpits. She began laughing quite hard as the prong poked in and wriggled about, having no way to move even a little to protect herself. More appeared and began poking her ribs, while a pair of mechanical hands wrapped around and began scratching all over her tummy. The girl was squealing in ticklish desperation, unable to move at all in this position. April watched her carefully: she was certainly laughing very hard, but she was looking too flush, at least not right now. She was clearly a very ticklish girl, sometimes calling out for the tickle torture to stop, but unable to do anything to make it happen. As the hands worked their way around her tummy, she almost looked like she was throwing a laughing temper tantrum. April glanced back down at the controls, trying to turn this into something clinical despite what was happening beyond the glass. The girl was being tickled at 58%, just a little short of the maximum allowed, and their points were rising very fast. Yes, this would be worth it in the end, but the hour passed rather slowly. As the prongs poked up and down the girls ribs and tickled her armpits, she was sputtering with laughter, pleading for them to stop. Erica even suggested it at one point, but at least if they finished she wouldn't have gone through this for nothing. So the hour wore on, the point count rose, and the girl laughed and squirmed and cried out for them to let her go.

Finally, the counter hit 0:00, and the tickling stopped. The window was again blocked off, and an offer was made for one of two prizes:

-A key: this could be used for one of the computer terminals, and the controls specifically stated it would not trigger a trap
-A lucky charm: used near a puzzle game, it would improve their odds a little bit
14121221222111112111111.title: Step Right Up And Win A Prize!

choices: Head towards the center of the labyrinth
Try to find something to help ward off monsters
141212212221111121111111.content:
Given what had happened to her, the key was very off-putting, but she figured that if there was ever a time to find out if the rules could be trusted, it was early in the game when that knowledge would be useful. Besides, while admittedly every time she thought things couldn't get worse they did, it couldn't get worse to the same degree it had the first time - she could only be gender-swapped once without it turning into a prize. She took the key.

The door opened, and Erica and April whirled about, only to see four girls come in and slam it behind them. "There's no lock!" one said in desperation. From the look of it, they were 'game pieces,' about fifteen and apparently escaping something.

"Can we block the-" the girl speaking saw them - she was dressed like Hannah Montana. "Can you help us?" she asked desperately.

"We can try," Erica said. "What's going on?"

"There's some kind of... thing out there! It took Molly!" They all jumped as there was a thump on the door.

"Get behind me," Erica said, and the girls were only too happy to do so. There was another thump, then a louder one, and then the door caved in, and it stood there. It was about seven feet tall and roughly shaped like an ape, with six arms, one of which had a girl tucked in it - she was laughing hard. "Ideas?" she asked April quickly.

"I hate to blow it now," April said, "but your perfume bottle will get rid of it, and I don't see any other options."

Erica nodded and pulled out the bottle. The beast lumbered across the room towards them, so Erica aimed at it and sprayed. The creature roared, dropped the girl, and bolted from the room so fast it damaged the door frame on the way out. Molly was dropped on the floor, still laughing.

"What the hell was that thing?!" asked a girl dressed like a biker chick.

"One of the dungeon monsters," April said, carefully peering up the hallway after it. It was already long gone. "Looks to be safe for the moment," she told Erica.

"What's going on? Where are we?" asked Hannah Montana again.

"You're in a labyrinth," Erica said, bending down to look at Molly. "It's a bit complicated, but we're here to help you."

"How? You've got special monster training?"

"We have some experience with this," April said, also coming to look at Molly. "There's a safe spot where monsters can't reach you, we'll try to get you there."

"Don't you have any guns or something?"

"I- Let's just say my weapon was confiscated by the man in charge," April said. "But there are still other ways to make it." She turned to face the four of them, realizing it wasn't going to be as simple as Dr. Tickles described it, that these girls wouldn't just automatically follow them. "I know you're scared, and a lot of this doesn't make sense to you, but we've dealt with the man in charge and understand most of what's going on here. If you want a chance to ever get out of this place, you have to come with us."

"April," Erica said, "look at this." April bent down and saw a pink blob plastered on Molly's left side, directly on the skin. "That's probably what's responsible."

"What is that?" asked a girl dressed like a zombie.

"It's some monster eating her from the outside in!" said Hannah Montana in horror.

"No," Erica said. "It won't kill her. It was probably there to keep her from resisting, but what is it?"

"We should take her back to the safe room," April said. "Look her over, try to figure this out."

"Can monsters enter the safe room?" she asked in a whisper.

"I shouldn't think so; wouldn't be much of a safe room if they could."

"Good point. Can two of you help her walk?" she asked the four remaining girls. "There's a place we can go that'll be safe."

"For the moment," April added quickly. "The only truly safe place is the center of the labyrinth, but it should give us plenty of time for now to look your friend over." They seemed uncertain. "We just saved you from that thing, if we were your enemies we could have just let it have you."

The girls didn't seem so sure. "If you know so much, then what the hell was that thing?" biker chick asked.

"A class 1 octo-rilla," April said. "Great strength, average senses, average reasoning abilities, capable of still fighting at seventy percent efficiency even while four of its arms are occupied, shall we go?" she led the way out of the back of the room. The four girls looked at each other, then finally grabbed Molly and followed, Erica taking up the rear. They were soon back in the safe room. "There's food and drink there," April pointed. "See those two makeup chairs? Stay the hell away from them, and don't touch anything you don't have a name for besides 'thingie.'"

Molly was laid on the couch. Her laughter had now reached more of a chuckling sound. "Molly?" Erica asked. "Can you hear me? Nod if you can hear me." Molly managed a nod. "Good. Is this pink blob tickling you?" A big nod. "Has it slowed down?"

"A little," Molly managed to get out.

"Did the creature that was carrying you put it on you?" Molly nodded.

"It... hehehe it ta-talks hahahaha to me..." Molly got out.

Erica looked at April, then hesitantly leaned closer to the blob to listen. She heard nothing. She got closer and closer, then finally put her ear on it-

NOOOOOHOHOHOOO SHUT IT OHOHOHOHOOOOF. the girl shrieked.

She passed locked doors where she could hear screaming and laughing.

Finally she arrived at tickle ward 22.

The nurse wheeled her in and there were lots of nurses armed with feather dusters.

One of the nurses approach her bed.

What happens next?

142131.content:
The creepy nurse was glaring down at Erica from the head of the gurney, so that her face looked upside-down from Ericaâs view looking straight up. Erica squirmed and pleaded but could hardly move, strapped tightly to the table-like top of the contraption.

         âOh dear! I am so excited youâre with us here in Ward 22. I really canât tell you!â, the crazy-eyed nurse beamed down at slender little Erica, âTell me sweetie, do you likeâ¦tickling?â, the nurse leered down at her reaction.

         âN-No, ma'am! I mean, I do â just not like this!â, pleaded Erica as she strained to extract even one of her limbs from the thick leather bonds holding her down face-up on the creaky gurney.

         âOh, you are a fidgety little kitten, arenât you? My name is Nurse Jane, and Iâll be in charge of your treatment while youâre here. Whatâs your name, puddinâ-pop?â

         âIâm Erica M'am, and I just want to go home now. Please?â, begged Erica even as the nurse moseyed round to the side of the gurney now, menacing Ericaâs entire torso.

         âErica? What a pretty name for a pretty little girl! Youâll go home Erica. Donât worry. You just need to pass this simple examination first dear.â said the nurse as her reassuring grin grew into a terrifying toothy smile, âCan you guess what it involves? Hmm?â as she began to playfully tickle Ericaâs sides and belly through her skintight leotard.

         Anticipating her coming torment, Ericaâs eyes were squeezed shut and she began to make funny whining and snarling noises as she barely managed to mewl, âtickling?â before bursting into gales of laughter atop the creaky gurney at the first glancing touch of fingers along her ribs.

         The crazy nurse claps her hands together loudly, seemingly thrilled that Erica got the answer right on her first try, âThatâs RIGHT, Erica! You are the best patient Iâve had all shift! TICKLING!â, and the maniac begins to really give it to Erica, scrambling her fingertips all up and down her entire body and down to her knees, before moving her way up again, causing the little girl to convulse and scream with laughter as she writhes around in place. Things only get worse as she figures out where the Ericaâs panic-button spots are, and begins to focus on those, sending the pretty little girl into a crazed, ticklish conniption atop the hospital gurney.

         âTickly-tickly-tickling! Thatâs what youâll get until we free those evil demons from you, child. Yes, Erica! We need to drive out the devil that possesses your body. Itâs the evil influence that causes you to wiggle and giggle at the slightest touch, dear, and I and my colleagues wonât stop until youâve been cleansed of the spirits possessing you! Hallelujah! Blessed be! Letâs make a miracle happen in the flesh Lord!â
142131.title: Tickled while strapped to the bed

1421313.content:
The crazy nurse waddled to the door and hailed out on the floor in a too loud voice. "I have a case of 22 D here. Who is available for treatment? Sarah? Dominique? Sato?" A flurry of excited responses was followed by far too many footsteps for Erica's taste. One tickler was certainly more than enough. But with more adults around nothing could happen to her. Right?

Her mood fell further when she saw five other nurses, looking more or less as crazy as the first one, dashed into the room while pushing and shoving. All of them held two featherdusters in beautiful colors. Still they made Erica shudder. One of them held four items and handed two of them to the nurse who had strapped Erica earlier.

"Diagnosis: servere 22 D. Needs desensitizing and cleaner mind. Stand at attention." Bewildered Erica saw the five new nurses saluting military style with their feather dusters pointing to their own heads. When they took their feather dusters down again one of them pointed it to Erica's nose. She flinched and ducked but the intention was not to tickle her nose. "We need a relocation. This is not in line with procedure 287F. I suggest position stable arch with single access and double exit." While the other nurses nodded Erica did not understand a single thing. Was that doctor speech? Were they speaking about her?

"Wait. How? Please can I go home now?" Erica spoke in a low and rapid voice as two nurses liberated her of her current bonds and carried her held by ankles and wrists. "I can walk, I can walk" she wailed. "Please let me down." When the nurses held her over a different bed they dropped her. Erica found that very funny and giggled. But the nurses grabbed her hands and tied them close to each other to the top of the frame. Accompanied by protests she feld hands grabbing her ankles, pulling and spreading them. "No. Not so far" she winced. When her ankles were tied to the other side of the bed she was well stretched but not uncomfortable. Before she could launch another wave of protest one of the nurses grabbed her buttocks and pulled Erica*s lower body into the air. "Aiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii Get your hands away from my booty." The hands removed quickly, but at the expenses that now Erica's body was arched by a big firm cushion that had been placed under the small of her back. She gulped. The arch. Single access was from her hands. Double exit were her spread legs. That was her. She howled and pleaded and begged.

The nurses took position next to the bed, three on each side. They raised both featherdusters and wiggled them over the tense skin. Erica gulped. Having lost her mittens and shoes now wearing nothing else but a tight thin leotard gave her very little protection. Maybe it was all a game yet.

It began on her face...feet.
1421313.title: Other Nurses Join in the Fun

14213131.content:
Into Erica's vision came a flurry of rainbow colored fibres. They were so close to her eyes that it was hard to focus on them. "Look at this my dear. It will clean your mind and render you unticklish for the rest of your lives." "Yeah, Yeah, listen!" the other nurses applauded. "My mind needs no....spthfhththtthe rmvthisthng" could only be heard when the feather duster stroked slowly over her lips and nose, requiring to speak into the fibres. It tickled a lot on her lips, which could be eased by retracting the lips into the mouth and keep it tight shut. But the fibres that brushed her nose intruded and made the sensitives nerves there scream in protest.

"Ohnohmhfhahfhmfhmfnooo" she squealed and rapidly turned her head, trying to rub her nose hard on the fabrics. But that did not really help. Erica pushed her lips out out and pouted to rub her nose with her lips, but that only exposed them again to the fibres. Briefly she managed to keep hold of the moving duster by squeezing it between mouth and nose. But she yelped when it moved slowly and some nosy fibres intruded into her nose more deeply. Then she had a sneezing attack. Her whole arched body shook alongside.

When the duster disappeared her nose itched like mad. To the amusement of the nurses Erica just had to continue to reach her nose. As a last resort she stuck out her tongue and tried to lick her own nose. But both tongue and nose were too short if that could be said. She looked up to the nurse and pleaded in a soft voice. "Please rub my nose. It itches so much."

The nurse
- surprisingly did rub her nose - sort of
- laughed and had other plans
14213131.title: face

142131311.content:
"Please rub my nose." Erica pouted her lips. They met her nose but that did little to remove the itching deeper inside. The nurses left the tied girl and huddled. On occasions they gave the girl quick glances over her shoulder. Each of them was still holding those feather dusters the girl decided she would never buy in her life. Who would want to have such tickle torture instruments in your house?

When the nurses returned the one who spoke and tickled Erica on her face earlier said to the girl. "You can chose during this session one part of your body that will not be tickled further. Just one. If you have spent the joker the joke will be on our side." The nurses wiggled with their feather dusters to underline this. Erica sneezed again and pondered. Having her nose solved would help a lot. But she was helplessly ticklish in many places. Having just one that was spared was cruel.

"Which one? Hm Hm Hm?" The nurses surprised the tied girl by sticking the feather duster directly into her face, like an overly exited reported might do with his microphone, fibres covering all of the face around mouth and nose. With every "hm" she shoved the feather duster up. The fibres at the top intruded deep into Erica's nostrils and awoke the tiger there. "Aiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiieeeeeeeeeeek. Hapfhfffffff Oooooooooooooooooooaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhiihihihihi" she cringed as deep inside her nose an itching storm broke lose. The decision was quickly made. "My nose. But rub it will you?" "Ask us to tickle every part of your body but not your nose. Then we will spare it and I will rub it." Erica understood only part of what was said. Her longing for a nose rub was overwhelming. "Please tickle me everywhere BUT RUB MY NOSE NOW!"

Finger and thump grabbed the little girl's nose and rubbed it. With much "guaffff" and "hmhmpfligherhmfhlower" the tiger in Erica's nose was convinced to sleep again.

"Now we can start in earnest." The nurse held her feather duster over Erica's nose. "No! you promised!" the girl protested. "Just joking". With that two nurses lowered their pair of feather dusters to Erica's

The rolling tunnel is too scary for the doe-eyed ten-year old, who returns and slips behind the changing screen long enough to strip out of her kitten costume and into the white panties, ankle socks, red-&-black plaid skirt, and button-up blouse. Nervously, she listens as loud, heavy footsteps seem to be approaching the changing room. Finishing with the ribbons in her hair, the skittish little schoolgirl slips into the shoes and grabs up the lunch-pail before whomever or whatever it is finds her there!

Grabbing the handle to the door with both hands, Erica enters:
1422.title: Changes her mind and walks over to the schoolgi...

Goes further to her left to read the sign on the other door.
14222.content:
Erica closes the door quietly behind her, and surveys the darkened school hall she has suddenly arrived in. It appears she can go either to her left or right down the hall. Along the wall facing her, she sees shadowy trophy cases and rows of lockers. She feels the doorknob wiggle, as if someone on the other side were trying it, but finding it locked. Then, as if by magic, she feels the doorknob slide out of her hands! Erica looks behind her and discovers the door is completely gone! She tries the wall, looking for gaps or seams, and finding none. It is as if she simply appeared here, in the middle of this quiet, dark hall. "At least who ever it was trying the door didn't get through!", she imagines.

Perplexed, the adorably outfitted Erica quietly surveys the hallway in both directions. Down the hallway to her right, there appears to be a turn towards some lighted area, perhaps towards a way out of here? To her left, it looks like the hall dead-ends, with a couple of shadowy, uninviting doorways with rusted plaques. She can definitely make out one that reads, "Interrogations Coordinator" on it. She wasn't even sure what that meant exactly, but she felt an eerie chill just reading the weathered brass faceplate. Does she dare go further to find out what the other door reads?
14222.title: Scary School Hall

choices: Try to tiptoe past them while they bully the girl
Try to tiptoe back down the hall towards the left
Try to intervene on the girl's behalf
142221.content:
Following the hall to the right towards the light seems like the best option, and Erica ventures timidly up to the corner and quietly peeks around.

         Erica sees a better-lit (but still oddly subdued and creepy) hall with a trophy case on one side, and student lockers on the other. She sees two older students, almost as old as her stepbrother Paul, bullying a little blonde girl in a school dress that matches what Erica is wearing. They seem to be trying to make her undress and put on some garment that they are holding out to her, but she is embarrassed at the notion, and looks on the verge of tears at their incessant demands.
142221.title: Hall Monitor Meanies with a Victim

choices: Bra and panties with a twist
1422211.content:
When Erica spotted the blond girl corned by two much bigger boys she gulped. It was even more obvious here that she was prey in this place. A quick glance back over her shoulder into the dark corridor she was about to leave reassured her that she would not turn back. Perhaps, if the boys were too busy with the poor girl she could sneak past them.

While she slowly stepped forward she had her eyes glued and her ears focused on the three young people in the dimly lit corner next to the row of the locker rooms. As she was quiet and the words more demanding even though they all spoke in a low voice she was more and more able to listen. She saw the girl violently shake her head, which was followed by one of the boys grabbing her arms and pressing her to the wall. "...please let me go" she winced. "..don't want to wear that...". "Oh you will" the other boy threatened "and you better hurry. Your presentation is in...", he looked in mock horror at his watch, "in two minutes. If you are late you know what will happen".

Erica was still quietly moving forward but biased her route a bit closer. She was a curious, some would say rather nosy girl. And meanwhile she wanted to know everything about the affair. That was one of her features which was less suitable to keep her out of trouble. The hall was empty and silent otherwise as the girl sniffed, a tear sparkling in her eye. "If you manage you know that you can go home." The boy holding her said almost sweetly. "If not, or if you refuse, we will play with you for a few hours." the other boy threatened, leaned forward, pulled out her blouse, reached under it and prodded her unprotected bare ribs and sides. Her eyes went wide and she squealed and wormed in vain. 'I hate those boys' Erica felt her anger rise. After two more steps she heard the girl sigh and say. "Ok I'll wear it." She was released from her grip and the item, which had been dropped earlier when the boy moved forward, was picked up again by him. He held it well visible into a ray of light. Erica could see the girl's eyes fixed on it. What was it?

An unusual bra and panties set? Some other garment with a twist?
1422211.title: Try to tiptoe past them while they bully the girl

14222111.content:
What dangled there was a black matching set of bra and panties. But the shape looked odd and there was certainly something wrong with it. But she was too far away to really see what was wrong. "Give it to me" the girl hissed and tried to grab it from the boy. His hand shot up and it dangled now clearly out of reach of the much smaller girl. She jumped to grab it, but the other boy gave her a quick rib tickling and with a shriek of anger and surprise she pulled her arms to her sides for protection.

Slowly the item came into her reach. It was maybe Erica's last chance to see what was wrong with it before, well, it would probably disappear under schoolgirl clothes. She wondered how that would work. This was a school hall and not a female locker room. "Pleeease I need it now" the girl wailed. Time for her was running out. Erica made two quick steps and was now less than fifteen feet away. The bra and panties were slowly passed over.

a) Erica squinted her eyes. There was something furry or fluffy inside. From the outside it was plain black material, probably even satin. But she could see that on the inside it was equipped with - feathers. And when it briefly dangled she could see that the waistband of the panties and the underside of the bra, which was anyway too big for this girl, was much thicker than it should be. She shivered and stopped.

b) Erica squinted her eyes. The bra and panties looked formal but when they were handed over the straps did not dangle. It looked like a bra and panties statue. The girl winced when her hand touched it. "It is too cold." she complained. In vain. Erica's mind raced. How could it be cold? The thin metal clip? Nonsense. Now wait. Had those nasty boys dipped it into water and let it freeze solid for some hours? It would be horrible having to wear that.
14222111.title: Bra and panties with a twist

142221111.content:
Turning towards the wall the girl quietly reached under her schoolgirl skirt and pulled down her own blue panties. Erica could see that she wanted to get this over quickly. When she stepped out of the panties and lowered her arms to pull up the feathered ones a male hand lifted her skirt and exposed her butt. The other hand of the same boy trailed along her butt very close to her butt crease. She shrieked, wiggled and almost tumbled, but finally managed to pull the panties up. When she stood straight again she stood awkwardly still.

Erica quietly moved forward. She considered herself correctly lucky that the boy's attention was fully drawn by the show the girl provided. Taking position in front of the last locker she peeked around it to see what else developed there. Meanwhile the girl spun the bra around and seemed unsure what to do. Chuckling one of the boys grabbed her shoulders, turned it around and began unbuttoning her blouse. "No!" she firmly insisted. "I do that myself". Facing the wall again the blouse was unbuttoned. But her head turned towards the boy, eyes pleading. "Would you...I don't know ....I have not yet...ah...". Being a gentlemen the boy certainly helped. When he pulled at her blouse she held it tightly with her hand. "Don't strip me. Put it on with the blouse." Only when the boy explained patiently that this type had not strings to tie and that she would have to put her arms through the girl reluctantly pulled her arms from the sleeves and kept the blouse like a coat hanging over her shoulders.

For Jack, the other boy, the whole thing took too long and lacked fun. He grabbed her wrists, pulled them up enough to make the blouse drop and held them for his friend. Against the protests of the blond girl who tried without much success to kick back the boys each grabbed a wrist and fumbled with the bra. As they were now standing directly next to her they could see down her bare chest. What they saw made them grin. The girl had only recently began to blossom. Her breast were still tiny but the nipples were already poking curiously into the world. Especially on her soft arm, her armpit and over her sides their fingers trailed when they pulled down the bra. The girl wiggled and wailed, pleading for them to be careful. When she thought it was over she grabbed her blouse but the boys pointed out that the bra and panties needed to be in place property.

Without consideration Erica put her arm over her tiny breast for virtual protection, and later squeezed it between her legs. This equipment seemed to be difficult to be set in place given the amount of time and attention of the boys it took. This was accompanied by shrieks, accusations and sharp inhales of air, especially when the panties needed readjustment.

Being too nosy brought Erica in trouble again. Quicker than she expected the boys turned around and saw her peeking around the corner. Her fate was sealed when her arm was pulled behind her back and held there. "Look there is another new one. Let's..." take her
- into the classroom to attend the presentation
- downstairs

Erica herself wanted to die of shame on behalf of the poor little blonde girl who was even now removing her own panties and donning the thick cloth diaper proffered by the stouter of the two sneering boys. Her school dress only barely covered the diaper, deepening her humiliation. The taller boy tells her, âYou can have these back IF you can make it through the rest of the school day without wetting your diaper like a little baby girl!â, and he furtively shoves her panties in his jacket pocket.

         Ericaâs heart goes out to the pretty little girl being made to wear a diaper during her school day, but she was utterly mortified at the thought of herself being put through a similar embarrassment, and is quivering with trepedition as she tiptoes as quiet as can be past them in the school hallway.

         It looks like she has a good shot at making it, and she is about to reach the corner and perhaps to freedom!
