14223.title: Other choice(s)

142232.content:
Erica had no idea how, but she was certain that the reason she was climbing out of a school closet was because she had went with the school uniform. Dr. Tickle was a maniac, but he wasn't really random, though she still had no idea how she managed to teleport her back to this school. She was pretty much just going with whatever happened right now, but despite this mindset, she was still rather shocked to find a sweaty shirtless teenage boy wearing navy school pants and black dress shoes jump off her, wiping his lips with the back of his hand.

"Good times, girl but I gotta go to class." The boy whispered over his shoulder as he sprinted away while buttoning up white school his shirt.

Erica thought about waving, but wisely decided against it, she had no clue what happened, but she felt tainted for some reason. She looked up and down the main halls, there was no else in the halls. She remembered that the main corridors only had people in them when there wasn't class. Erica walked up the clock at the front of the halls. The clock has stopped. As Erica wondered what on Earth was happening here, she heard the echoes of footsteps approaching

It was....
142232.title: A closet off of the main halls

1422321.content:
It was a stern-looking teacher that Erica didn't recognize. The teacher had a cane in one hand and was dragging a crying long-haired girl with the other hand. The spectacled teacher glanced at Erica and barked, "What are you doing out here, young lady?"

"Uh, I'm ah..." Erica spluttered and began to turn away as she thought about running but the teacher was quicker than she looked and quickly hooked a manicured talon around her arm and dragged her across to a classroom.

"Disgraceful behavior... Truanting in this establishment... Foul children..." The teacher muttered angrily as she dragged them outside a classroom. She knocked on the door and a scowling bearded teacher came to the door. The scowl dissipated, well become somewhat less obvious when he saw the spectacled teacher.
"Something the matter, Madame Mallory?"

"Yes, Professor Lich, I believe these girls are members of your class."

The professor barely glanced at the girls. "So they are."

"Be sure to discipline them for their truancy."

"Of course, ma'am."

Erica and the teary girl, slowly walked into the class, Erica was disgusted to see the boy from earlier, with his shirt buttoned up wrong, winking at her from the front row. The other girl took a seat at the back and Erica made a beeline to join her, but the teacher grabbed her shoulder and thrust her into a seat in front of the class, right next to the teacher's desk.

"Thanks for volunteering." The teacher said flatly.
"You too, Lucinder, don't think you're getting out of this." He said, glaring at the Erica's companion.

Lucinder despondently left her safe seat in the back for the one in the front next to Erica. She looked afraid,
Erica very reluctantly sat down in the cold plastic chair.

"Now that everyone is finally here," the professor shot the two girls glares, "I can begin explaining what will happen today."

"Today is AC day, alternative curriculum day, a day dedicated to branching out and exploring a different realm to all the subjects you know and love." Lich droned on, he sounded uninterested.

"At the end of each lesson, you get a score out of ten based on your performance. You need more than fifty at the end of the day to secure a pass. Simple stuff. Any questions, maggots?"

"Yeah," the boy with the misbuttoned shirt said, "where do we go after this? Not that I don't totally love your class or anything."

Lich threw an eraser at the boy, who ducked at the sailed and hit the girl behind him, "Cut the cheek, Ellington, or I'll wash your mouth at with soap. There's schedules outside. Any other stupid questions?"

Another boy in the front row raised his hand, but the teacher ignored him.

The lesson we have first is...
1422321.title: Class

14223211.content:
"The first lesson is Psychology, the study of behavior and today we're going to study reaction to stimuli, usually we would have a lot more science and theory work, but because of the fact that this school is going to the dogs, we're going to screw tradition and take the fancy innovative approach. This is going to be a bloody practical because the higher-ups think that's a bloody good idea. That's where our two lovely volunteers come in." Lich finished, his speech dripping with sarcasm.

Erica recognized the terms "reaction to stimuli" and had a sinking feeling what was going to happen next. She scrambled to her feet but before she could even take a step, her classmates grabbed her and quickly bound her down, eagle-spread onto a X-frame she hadn't noticed when she had came in, she tried to squirm free, but there were too many of them and she resigned herself to getting strapped down onto the firm.. Lucinder got the same treatment, only with less of a struggle.

After both girls were securely strapped in, Lich turned around to address the class, he had just been writing on the chalkboard, Erica could dimly make out a few long words but she didn't have a good view.

"Alright, muppets, split yourselves into two groups, half of you experiment on Luci and the other half on-" he snapped his fingers as he thought.

"Erica!" She shouted.

"Yeah, her. Go." The professor said casually as he dug out a newspaper and went to the sports section. He put his feet on the table as he flicked through the pages
Erica audibly gulped as she saw the ten-kid strong gang surround her, wiggling their fingers menacingly.

"Hehe, guys, we can talk about this, right?"

"Let's think about that, for a moment." A boy said, Erica recognized it as the boy from earlier, Ellington was his name.

"C'mon, uh, Ellington, let me out."
The boy stroked his chin, seemingly deep in thought as he used his over hand to slowly tease her tummy through the fabric.Erica squirmed and wriggled, a few giggles escaping her mouth as the grinned uncontrollably.

"Well, why? You sure seem to be having a fun time. Ain't that right, guys?"

Ellington gestured to the rest of the group, who seemed to take the hint and began gently tormenting Erica's very ticklish body, a very spider-tickle motions across her socked feet, light scribbling at her underarms, squeezing her sides a little, all this little touches were driving her crazy and the worst part was, Erica knew it was only going to get worse.

"You sure seem happy about this." Ellington giggled as he scrambled his fingers along her midsection.

"Haha, that's cos you're tickling me!" Erica cried.

"Tickling? That's a great idea!" Ellington laughed as Erica screamed with ticklish laughter.

"Oi! Kiddies, you're having too much fun in my class!" Lich bellowed, thumping his hand on the desk, evidently, his favorite sports team had lost a close game that the professor had bet money on.

Ellington and his posse stopped tickling to look at the teacher, Erica gasped for breath, Lucinder's group stopped as well, she was panting almost as hard as Erica was.

Lich propped his elbows on the desk and snapped at the kids to be quiet.
"And because I'm losing the will to live, seeing this school's education system go to pieces, I'm going to at least make an effort to educate you maggots. I want to see both groups demonstrate the Babinski reflex. Did I stutter, muppets? Show me!"

"Uh, okay... What's the plan, guys?" Ellington asked, as the groups got back to their 'volunteers.'

Lucinder was squealing with giggly laughter, so the Babinski reflex certainly didn't sound like fun.

Ellington and the group tickled her...
14223211.title: Psychology

142232111.content:
Ellington quickly darted over across the room where the other psychological volunteer was 'stimulated', Lucinder was giggling uncontrollably as two boys held her feet still while the others kept on stimulated her ticklish feet. Her painted toenails were spasming like wriggling worms.a friend of his over in the other group quickly whispered in his ear the answer and Ellington jogged back, a smile on his face.

"Feet," he said triumphantly, "Along the arches, meant to make her toes wiggle like crazy. That makes sense, right?"

A boy with thick-framed glasses nodded, "Even if it's wrong, a famous guy once said, 'energy and persistence conquers all things.' Especially school."

"The guy sounds real wise, man." Ellington nodded as he gestured to the group and fingers pounced on Erica's trapped feet.

"AHHH! THAHAT'S NOT HAHOW IT GOES!" Erica screamed as she felt four sets of hands attack each foot. 144.content:
Erica shyly slips out of her kitty bodysuit and into the equally form-fitting puppet costume behind a changing screen. The festive skin-tight outfit seems to cinch at each of her joints. Not too tightly, but in an odd fashion. Lastly, it’s on with her party mask, and Erica proceeds cautiously through the door.

As soon as she steps both feet inside, the mask releases a puff of vapor that sends the pretty ten-year old into a dazed faint. She falls gently to sleep as she lays down on the checkered floor of the white-walled, circular-shaped room.

Erica reawakens in the same position, on the same floor, still in her puppet get-up, only her mask is now gone. Looking around, she instantly discovers that she has almost no motor control over the muscles in her arms or legs! She can feel them, but they flail uselessly around when she attempts to move them! Erica plaintively asks the walls, “Hello? Anybody?”.

“Oh, good! You’re awake. How do you feel, my pretty new puppet?”, asks the jolly-yet-sinister voice of Dr. Tickles from somewhere above her. Craning her neck, the girl sees a sort of observation-window relatively high on the wall across from her. She emits a cute “Eep!” of fear at who she sees inside. It’s the mad head-in-a-jar, Dr. Tickles! He looks especially fiendish now, as he sits above a glowing green orb, glowering down at a small, doll-like puppet figure lying exactly like Erica in the center!

“Feeling ‘Eep’, are we?”, he laughs, “As you’ve already surmised, you still have complete feeling in all of your adorable body, only I’ve gone and stolen your motor-control! Allow me to demonstrate!”. Suddenly, the room she is in is bathed in a greenish light, and Erica finds herself being lifted, as if by her waist, clear off of the floor! Making it all the more frightening, is seeing that her body is mimicking the same motion as the puppet clenched in Dr. Tickle’s tentacles!

“NO! No, please? Why me?!?”, sobs Erica, as she flounces around in midair, limbs not responding anything like she is accustomed to.

“Don’t worry, my weepy puppet-toy.”, laughs the cruel genius, “Each of your little friends is receiving equal treatment even as we speak. There is still a chance that you won’t be ‘The One’ chosen to stay here with us, forever! Little pigeons like you are too easy to pluck. I prefer a girl with more fight in her, like your big brother Paul’s date Casey. However, we do cater to a certain more rarified customer base. There are those who consider the utter exploitability of a young child like you to be the most sublime satisfaction. It is for them that I, Dr. Tickles, present my latest creation. Behold! The Puppeterium!”. Erica hears clapping from what sounds like the walls around her, although she can’t make out any windows from her vantage point on the floor.

“Thank you, thank you, everybody! Wave to the crowd, Erica.”, grins Dr. Tickles as Erica suddenly feels her right arm pulled up and moved side-to-side, “Erica has agreed to be our test-puppet for today’s proceedings. I’m sure we’ll all happily give her a big hand. (laughter and enthusiastic approval from the walls behind her). Now witness the miracle, as I bend her into whatever position I choose for tickling! Ha Ha Ha!”.

Suddenly, Erica feels her body being manipulated into all sorts of crazy poses, still floating in mid-air under the greenish lighting. Looking closely, Erica realizes that her costume is painted on now! She isn’t even wearing the thin fabric she was when she first donned the puppet suit. “No wonder it feels so skintight! It IS!”, she frets.

Still noodling around with the puppet (and thus Erica, too), Dr. Tickles continues to speak, “Now, watch carefully as I place nubile little Erica into the contorted sort of pose that only girls her age can bear for any length of time.”

Erica suddenly finds her body being bent into a goofy pose, sitting with her legs spread wide and straight ahead, back arched, and her elbows above and behind her head, effectively leaving her body vulnerable to tickling nearly anywhere. “There. How’s that?”, the evil madman asks of the unseen spectators. “Once you choose your pose, you simply press the button to lock her in to position.”
Erica floats helplessly in midair, aghast that she can be posed like a doll, using her body against her so that she is trapped into all kinds of contortions. “Next, press the button again, and- “, continues Dr. Tickles, who suddenly disappears from the window as if sinking down.
Amidst a whir of machinery, a door below the window opens, and out comes a comfortable recliner chair, with Dr. Tickles sitting in it, which zips across the room to the hovering, trapped girl, coming to a stop at bellybutton level, mere inches away from poor Erica, who is now sobbing pitiably, her entire ticklish torso on quivering display as his mechanized tentacles hover around her body, looking almost eager to tickle her.

“That’s a good girl, Erica”, guffaws the monster, “You just want me to tickle you all over that cute body!”, and he proceeds to do just that, causing her to squeal with laughter, “Yes you do! Yesh-yoo-do...Who’s a good girl?... You are! That’s right! Tickletickletickle!”, and his tentacles explore all over her silky smooth young body at their leisure, sending her into a laughing conniption, yet utterly helpless to move beyond the quivering of her muscles in response to the delicate torment.

“Now, one final note before we let one of you lucky spectators into the Puppeterium to play with dear Erica. While she will remain in the pose you decide on using the puppet in the control tower as you just saw me do, now that I am with her inside the room on the automated chair, I can change how she rests in mid air in that pose, and his tentacles turn Erica around so that she sits facing the opposite wall, where she can now easily see the high windows where a shadowy group of prospective purchasers are witnessing her humiliating stint as human puppet!

Leering over her shivering shoulder, Dr. Tickles proceeds to tickle Erica from behind, causing her to jerk and flounce around spastically in reaction, yet still unable to change the way she is positioned, hovering in air, victim to intimate, exquisite torture. “Now, which of you will be the first to experience The Puppeterium? We’ll start the bidding at $100 for five glorious minutes with your very own poseable puppet girl, Erica. Do I hear $100? $100. $200? Good. What’s that? $300? $300. $400-“, and so on, until someone in attendance wins with a $2000 bid!

As Dr. Tickles exits, poor puppet Erica still rests in mid-air in the same difficult pose, as the lucky winner makes their way around the tunnel outside the rounded Puppeterium room and into the control tower where the puppet figure sits inside the glowing green light, ready to be molded into another awkward pose.

Richard was unceremoniously dumped by the slide into a pool of water. Gasping, the boy made his way to the surface. He climbed out of the pool and looked around, water pooling at his feet. Nearby, he saw a beach towel and a bathing suit, just his size. Quickly, Richard slipped off his sopping wet sneakers and socks, followed by the rest of his clothes, and pulled on the dry speedo. He towel dried himself, then spread his sailor costume, underwear, and socks to dry. Only then did he dare to look around.

The ten-year-old's blue eyes went wide and he gasped; he was in a medieval torture chamber! Richard recognized the stocks, a wooden device designed to immobilize an offender's wrists and ankles. Next to that was a table, with three jugs of water, a bottle marked "itching powder", some brine, and several long feathers. The bleating of a pair of goats made his head spin in that direction, droplets of water flying from his wet blond hair. The other stuff he understood; it was for torturing the poor boy trapped in the stocks (which Richard was afraid would be him) but what were the goats for?

Richard decided he'd better not find out, and ran for the only exit, a locked wooden door. It was iron-banded, with a small barred window. He tried the latch, but it was bolted shut and locked from the outside. That mean man, Dr. Tickle's laughter echoed throughout the chamber.

"Leaving so soon? I wouldn't hear of it!"

The boy swallowed. "Great. Now he's quoting the wicked witch!"

"No, little boy," a face suddenly addressed him from the little window in the door. "We're worse."

a key was fitted into the lock, and the door creaked open. Dr Tickle and two big thugs came in, grabbed the struggling, skinny boy, and carried him over to the stocks. They tied Richard's thin wrists behind his back, then used more rope to bind his arms together behind him, cinching the knots tight. His ankles, as expected, were secured before him in the wood frame, and a shiny padlock snapped shut. The boy was completely immobilized, his bare feet presented for tickling. The evil man droned on. "We are called the Illuminati, my boy. You've been chosen to join us. However, your young mind must be conditioned first. Torture does that most effectively."

As Richard finished swallowing all three jugs of water, the other thug started to liberally apply itching powder to the boy's exposed skin. He started to squirm uncomfortably. "That itches!"

choices: Stay put so as not to anger his captors
153.content:
Richard awakens to find himself untied, cleaned-up, and back in his spiffy little sailor-boy suit. And his cruel captors and their goats? All gone. However, the stout wooden stocks still stand, mocking the boy's ticklishness, and he shudders at his total humiliation at the hands of Dr. Tickles and his henchmen.

Outside the room the ten-year-old can hear a cacophony of screams and laughter. He also hears funny horns and bells bleating and ringing, along with crazy music, singing, and more. It all seems to come at random, from behind walls in different directions outside the medieval torture dungeon room he reawakens in.

"I've got to find a way out of here", worries the trembling boy as he gingerly tiptoes toward the door in his little sailor togs, obviously in seer terror of what he'll find.

Too short to see high enough out the barred window on the cell door, he reaches out his shaking hand and -- it's open! Apparently, the men left in a hurry, and the usually self-locking door didn't quite come to a complete close when they left.

Astonished at his good fortune, Richard opens the door and peers down the hall in both directions. The narrow, dark hallway leads in either direction from the room, and the sounds of the funhouse seem louder now. Especially in the direction with a single lightbulb dangling overhead. As scared as he is by the chaotic noises issuing from somewhere down that end of the hallway, he is even more frightened of the darker, quieter end of the hall.

"If those noises are from the funhouse front to this evil madman's torture dungeon, maybe I can slip in with the crowd and escape!", thinks the traumatized child. As if to further add to his fear of the other, quieter and darker end of the hallway, Richard thinks he can make out the cackling mad voice of Dr. Tickles himself from that direction. Whether it IS the mad doctor, and whether he is talking to his evil henchmen or simply doing his shtick for the crowds walking or riding through some part of his peculiar carnival rides, the boy can't be sure.

He ventures further down, under the light, and past a small alcove with some metal shelving, crates and trunks. Past the piles of junk, the hall takes a turn. Richard can barely make out the outline of a doorway, and timidly pads toward it.

The carnival sounds are even louder now, and the laughing and cackling/screaming he hears as he approaches the doorway reminds the boy of what he has just endured. "I know it happened, even if I can't prove it! I can still feel the hands and tongues, tickling me, and my throat is still sore from laughing and screaming.", thinks Richard as a shiver runs up his skinny spine, mortified that he was tickled so badly that he peed himself before fainting out cold.

Amidst their laughing and screaming, there are loud mechanized guffaws from some hidden microphones, crazy colors dart all over the dark walls, making the footing tricky, but fun. All sorts of odd shadowy shapes line the hall, and Richard is terrified after seeing a carny clown jump out at a visitor, to scare her.

153111.content:

He gives a slight yelp and nearly bumps into the older kids ahead of him, such is his terror of the evil doctor.

The hall changes slightly, appearing to be stonework with strange symbols carved into it. The sounds of tropical birds and native drums and chanting seem to fill the area from the hidden loudspeakers high above, and strings adorned with numerous feathers hang low, slightly tickling and further blocking their vision as the laughing kids pass through.

The kids are laughing and screaming just ahead, around another corner, as Richard peers behind, no longer seeing what he thought was the doctor.

Suddenly, as he rounds the corner, Richard is astounded to see a brightly lit plexiglass cubical in the wall next to the hall. A nearly nude teenage girl is inside. She is sitting at the base of a colorful totem. Her arms are tied high above her head, and her feet actually stick out of stocks-like holes in the glass! Though too far out of reach for the passing spectators to touch, there are long feathers for use on her soft, helpless soles. She is wearing the bare minimum, with feathers mainly covering her luscious breasts and where her panties might normally be. Her face is half covered by a birdlike mask with more feathers, and she seems to be panicked, darting her head from side-to-side, as if expecting something from one side or the other.

As the older kids ahead laughingly replace the feathers they'd been tickling the blond beauty's feet with, a trapdoor pops up on her left side, and a figure dressed as a native pops-up and tickles her hips, sides and underarms as she screams and jiggles around. Richard stares, mesmerized, as her breasts bounce around from side to side as she frantically squirms from her ticklishness. Just as suddenly, the figure pops back down into it's hole as the girl gasps for breath.

Then, she seems to stop and recognize Richard! "You!", she cries. "Richard, right? It's ME, Casey! Your big brother's date! You've got to hel--", and her pleas are cut short when suddenly, natives from holes to both sides of her spring up from the trapdoors and commence to tickling her. A funny feeling occurs down in his ten-year-old groin as Richard watches the Casey's breasts jiggle delightfully with her ticklish tantrum. Suddenly, one of the faux natives turns his head towards Richard and says, "If you don't pick up the sacred feathers and tickle the sacrifice's feet, YOU will replace her on the alter to the God of Laughter!".

Guiltily, but secretly excited at the prospect of seeing her magnificent tits jiggling around some more, Richard...

Rounding a slight bend, Richard follows a staircase up into near-total darkness, as the voices and laughter of the kids ahead of him echoes, along with the voice of someone else. Reaching the top of the sloping corridor, Richard enters a tunnel encircling a grouping of cubicles surrounding a central, glass-walled area. As Richard passes by each of the small cubicles, he sees carnival-goers standing on colored areas and wielding odd wand-like instruments, parrying and thrusting with them almost as if they are in the midst of an imaginary swordfight or something!

Finally, Richard comes to an empty cubicle. Entering, he sees a green-colored area on the floor near a window looking into the central, glass-walled area surrounded by the cubicles. There is also one of the odd wands there on the floor of the green area. As Richard walks in and gazes at the wand, he notices it looks vaguely like a feather! Peering inside the central, glass-walled area, the boy is stunned to see a pretty, slender brunette-haired girl of perhaps fifteen inside. There is a collar around her neck with a chain leading up to the ceiling above her in the center of the room. Her hands are cuffed behind her back. She is thus forced to remain standing, with no way to protect or hide her body. The micro shorts she wore to the Fair are down around her ankles, hampering her movement, while her slinky top is similarly yanked well out of the way, leaving her in just her panties and little half-bra. The most mind-boggling part for Richard is seeing her flinch and yelp and wiggle around helplessly while a flurry of party-colored feathers pester her from all sides and angles!

Then, he sees it. There, on the floor below the girl: A green feather! Putting two-and-two together, Richard picks up the odd wandlike appliance inside his cube and begins waving it around. Instantly, the feather inside the glass room with the girl begins to float around, mimicking his every movement! Grinning merrily, Richard attempts to improve his aim with the wand, and, judging how far the feather is from the laughing girl, he begins to cause his green feather to poke along her thighs and rear, eliciting further cries of laughing anguish from the ticklish, tormented girl, who wriggles her arms to try to bat Richard’s green feather away even as she squeals from two of the other feathers stroking her along her neck and chest!

It appears that some of the feathers are stopping and simply drifting back down to the floor. Richard can't see who is inside the far cubicles, thanks to one-way glass, but he assumes that the group he was following may already be moving on to another area of the funhouse.

15313.content:
Richard's eyes open widely as he hears a rather ominous thump behind him. Scanning the dimly lit alcove that he just ran past, he realizes that something is moving within the various trunks and crates stacked against the wall. Frozen in prepubescent horror, Richard stares blankly at a rather large, gilded trunk. Edged with what looks like gold wirework, the trunk is huge.... easily large enough to fit the ten-year-old himself.

"Oh no..." he mumbles, half whispering to himself.

The trunk thumps again, and shifts ever so slightly against the cement floor. With the horrors of this place fresh in his mind, Richard hesitates. If he investigates the trunk, would a monstrous tickle-fiend emerge to greet him? But a more courageous thought bubbled in his brain: what if there was someone trapped in there? Clearly, Dr. Tickles had no qualms about false-imprisonment (among his other crimes!), and what if Richard could aid someone in dire need? Perhaps this was the first step to overcoming his fear?

As if to emphasize the urgency, the trunk thumps one final time, harder and louder than before. Richard, the scared sailor, took a step forward...

Her entire head is hidden in a rubber hood. Painted on the hood is a garish and almost ghastly-looking clown face, but even her hair is trapped inside the hood, so he isn't sure who it could be, although the boy suspects it might be his big brother Paul's date. Whoever she is, the sight of her magnificent body helplessly bound in the box in the same type of skimpy dress and negligible top as his brother's date was wearing stirs something in the boy. "Mrrrrnnnnmmmggh!", is the reply from the near-naked ball of high-toned babe tied-up inside the trunk.

"Someone's coming! I promise I'll come back to help you", the young boy tells the bound babe before closing the lid back on the trunk and -

Richard's shaking hands grab the front portion of the trunk, which is now ominously quiet. Gulping, he runs his hands along the seam of the lid, searching for some way to open it. Despite the container's massive dimensions and fine finish, it's only held closed with a tiny clasp... the perfect size for Richard's thin fingers.

Taking a deep breath, the young boy unhooks the latch, and pushes the lid with all of his might. It creaks open, and a vast pool of darkness seems to stretch into the depths of the trunk. Stepping on his tip-toes, Richard peers into the inky black... and sees something horrific within!

A writhing mass of tentacles comes screaming of the trunk, wormy limbs flailing this way and that. Richard barely has enough time to scream as the tendrils slide over the lid and sides of the gold-lined trunk, leaving long trails of slimy ooze in their wake.

As if capable of sight, the tentacles... oily grey snakes that they are... stop and orient themselves at the ten-year-old before them. Richard takes one step back as the dozens of limbs strike out at him!

Each tentacle has the strength of a grown man, and there must be dozens of them sputtering out at poor Richard! The boy can only cower as they coil and slither across the cement floor, stretching to unholy lengths, leaving a slick stain wherever they land.

His limbs are yanked apart forcefully by the tentacles, and he yelps as they tighten and encircle his arms and legs. "Ah!" he squeals, feeling their cold strength and oozy fluid soak into his sailor costume. Squirming his head back and forth, Richard's eyes widen as he's lifted off the ground. And yet, more tendrils emerge from the seemingly endless pit of the trunk! They twist and squeeze with muscular contractions, testing and tightening their grip on the terrified youngster.

And as suddenly as they emerged, the grey mass of eels retracts back into the trunk... this time, with Richard tightly bound in their grasp. He can do little but scream as he's sucked headfirst into the inky dark of the box, surrounded by endless tentacles, slurping and sucking his helpless form!

His last sight is of lid of the trunk snapping shut, leaving him in a writhing void of gooey snakes!

info.brief_description: Five young friends find themselves trapped in the carnival funhouse of a demented sadist.
info.description:
It's the Friday night before Halloween 2020, and it's evident that the first "date" between boy-crazy 16 year old extrovert Casey Sullivan and handsome-but-perhaps-a-tad-slow-witted 15-year-old Paul Roberts is off to a shaky start. Pretty Casey has her younger, mopey sister, 14 year old Shannon in tow, spoiling all her fun with her constant worrying; while Paul is stuck with his younger brother and sister (by his father's previous marriage) 10 year-olds Erica & Richard, in their cute little kitten and sailor outfits, tagging along behind the older kids.

As we enter the story, the kids are leaving the main fairgrounds stage area, their favorite country performer having been replaced by some sort of awful middle-aged new-wave band. Wandering through the thinning crowds of locals, the kids wind up down past the animal tents, near the carnival midway, where their parents made them swear they wouldn't venture.

Rules:


Partial nudity is allowed.
Erotic humiliation is fine, but no overt sexual encounters.
No killing-off of characters. No matter how bad their situation, they should be allowed to continue on through the dungeon after each humiliating encounter.


ATTENTION CONTRIBUTORS: I'm taking advantage of the benefits of a paid membership to edit in extra chapter choices to branch the story into. I will in no way alter or abridge author's original works (chapters or choices). I know the number of chapter choices authors are allowed with unpaid memberships are limited, and by going in and adding new possibilities, I hope to give the story fresh branches for contributors fantasies.
